info.title: Hellboy
info.writers: Mike Mignola Guillermo del Toro Peter Briggs

meta.s: In a photographic DARKROOM: old optical enlargers, porcelain trays, timers, and stills hanging out to dry.
GEORGE MATLIN, a slightly obese, nearsighted man in his seventies.
Super: CPL.
GEORGE MATLIN, combat photographer.

dialogue.name: OLD MATLIN
dialogue.s: I haven't talked about it for years, you know?
(looks at the camera) Everyone called me crazy...

meta.s: Matlin smiles as he paws through a box of old negatives.
Someone turns on the darkroom's red safety light for an eerie, dramatic effect.

dialogue.name: OLD MATLIN
dialogue.s: It all started back in Â´44.
I was a Corps photographer aboard an allied submarine...

meta.s: YOUNG MATLIN's hands again paw through a bunch of negatives, again under a red light.
Now, at 21, he's wedged in a submarine corridor, a crowded maze of pipes and gauges.
35mm still cameras dangle from his neck.
He shrinks back as a squad of MARINES hustles past him, loading weapons.
SGT.
WHITMAN, 44, tough as nails, pushes through, his uniform soaked in sweat.

dialogue.name: OLD MATLIN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: We had an English civilian on board.
Not much older than me but already an advisor to President Roosevelt.

meta.s: Whitman continues down the passageway until he reaches a small...
Within, an incongruously proper young Englishman "reading" an ancient set of Tarot cards.
TREVOR "BROOM" BRUTTENHOLM is a gaunt, olive-skinned man in his late twenties.
In his hands, a tarot deck.
He turns the cards face up: THE FOOL, THE MOON...

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: The sooner we're done, the better.

meta.s: Broom grabs a worn-down wooden box full of books and amulets.
It has a leather strap that allows him to carry it, much like a carpenter's tool box.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: This is an important mission, Sgt.

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: Oh -- you don't wanna know what I think.

meta.s: He moves away.
Broom takes a small box and a few amulets.
Before exiting, he pauses and tensely turns the last TAROT CARD: THE DEVIL.
OMIT
Super: OCTOBER 9, 1944, SCOTLAND.
It's raining like hell now.
Soldiers move through a short tunnel carved into the mountain.
Whitman signals his men to spread out, then comes alongside Broom.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: In private, if you don't mind...

meta.s: They enter the remains of a small chapel.
Broom produces the small box.
It's full of rosaries.
Whitman scowls and huffs.
A life-sized wooden Christ contemplates the scene from above.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Amongst other things, yes -- but that's hardly the point.

meta.s: Whitman locks and loads an automatic.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (Whitman moves away) Sergeant Whitman, I hope you don't think me mad --

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: Three days too late for that one, "professor."

meta.s: He moves away.
Broom looks up to the wooden Christ: It has no eyes.
MATLIN hauls his tripod and gear and joins the troops on the move.
Broom catches up with Whitman.

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: You're wasting our time: There's nothing on this island but sheep and rocks.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Built on an intersection of Ley Lines, the boundaries between our world and the other --

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: (interrupts him) What a load of crap.
Hell, a week ago I hadn't even heard the word parabnormal --

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: "Paranormal" (Whitman moves on) But -- you read the transmission.

meta.s: Reaching a slope, Matlin sets down his camera.
Turning, he sees lights.
Drenched, Broom and Whitman look down upon an impressive ROMANESQUE RUIN.
Under worklights, dozens of NAZI SOLDIERS swarm among thick stone walls and archways.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: They must be here for the sheep.

meta.s: OMIT
A dozen German soldiers swiftly assemble a large steel MACHINE.
The work is monitored by a spindly Nazi in BLACK LEATHER, his face covered by an odd gas mask: KROENEN.

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: The freak in the gas mask --

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Karl Ruprecht Kroenen, one of the Reich's top Scientists.
Head of the Thule Occult Society.

meta.s: He lowers a pair of binoculars and passes them to Whitman.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: If he's here, this is worse than I thought.

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: (to the radio man) Air and sea backup.

meta.s: The RADIOMAN cranks a transmitter to life.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Kroenen throws a switch: On the machine, dozens of gears respond!
Steam pistons thrust copper rails upright, lifting two mighty metal rings, not unlike a gyroscope.
Kroenen grunts and signals for more floodlights to be turned on.
The lights flood an ancient sacristy lined with eroded stone saints.
GRIGORY, tall and gaunt, stands naked, arms fully extended.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: No matter what happens to me, you must carry on with the work.

meta.s: ILSA, a severe, ageless Aryan beauty, reverentially drapes an embroidered robe over his bony shoulders.
He hands her a small LEATHER-BOUND BOOK.
It contains hand- drawn notes and illustrations.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: This will guide you back to me.

meta.s: He pulls her close, the clouds of their breath mingling.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: I grant you everlasting life, youth and the power to serve me.

meta.s: He dips his fingers in a wooden bowl full of blood, then wipes her tears away with a crimson thumb, both a consolation and a ritual.
VON KRUPT, an acrid German General, wearing dark SCARLET glasses and LEATHER GLOVES, appears.
Looks at his pocket watch.
On the gold lid: a SWASTIKA.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - CEREMONY - NIGHT

meta.s: Grigory walks towards the machine, its colossal steel and copper clockworks gleaming in the floodlights.

dialogue.name: VON KRUPT
dialogue.s: Five years of research and construction, Grigory.

meta.s: He strides alongside Grigory and Ilsa, who holds an umbrella to shield her master from the pouring rain.

dialogue.name: VON KRUPT
dialogue.s: The furhrer doesn't look kindly on failure.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: There will be no failure, General.
I promised Herr Hitler a miracle.

meta.s: Kroenen mutters excitedly as he opens a polished oak box containing a massive gold and copper MECHA-GLOVE.
Grigory extends his hand so that KROENEN may fit him with the contraption, which is attached to cables and hoses.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. THE HILLTOP - ALLIED SOLDIERS - NIGHT

meta.s: The Americans fan out, unseen.
Broom and Whitman dive into a ditch barely in time to avoid a German foot patrol.
Other GI's take up positions below a machine gun nest.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Grigory walks to the top of the altar, cables trailing behind him.

dialogue.name: GRIGORI
dialogue.s: Tonight, We will open a portal and awaken the OGDRU JAHAD: The seven Gods of chaos.
In an instant, all impurity in this world will be razed and from the ashes a new eden will arise.

meta.s: He looks down at the machine and whispers --
He flexes his fingers and in response -- -- the two metal rings swing around the machine's central axis.
TCHINK!!!
WHIRRR!!!
STEAM escapes from the ducts and pipes.
An invisible blast of energy forces the falling rain to swerve momentarily away from Grigory's body.
Ilsa signals TWO NAZI SCIENTISTS standing at a control panel.
One of them inserts a 20 inch SOLID GOLD CYLINDER into the machine.
Two openings remain vacant next to it.
A blade of light opens in the air!
Burning symbols slash the air, like living serpents of fire.
The edges of the cosmic slit sizzle with color; an ALIEN GALAXY sparkles on the other side.
Suddenly, a work light tears loose and flies in.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. COSMIC SLIT - FROM THE OTHER SIDE - NIGHT

meta.s: The six-foot work light tumbles by the massive OGDRU JAHAD: seven egg-like monoliths of unholy origin.
Within their translucent walls, horrible creatures lie slumbering.
As the light sweeps by, one of the giants opens a filmy eye, and then another, and another, and another... Fleshy tentacles move lazily within their crystalline prison.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Grigory screams as his body rises.
Veins swell in his neck, his face distorted by ecstasy and pain.
CLICK.
Someone shoots a photograph.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RUINS - IN THE UNDERBRUSH - NIGHT

meta.s: It's Matlin, snapping for all he's worth.
Whitman pulls him down and pulls out a large bayonet blade.

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: Listen to me, you moron: you do that again, I'll carve you a new --

meta.s: Too late.
One of the NAZI SCIENTIST has heard them.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RUINS, IN THE UNDERBRUSH - NIGHT

meta.s: The Nazi SCIENTIST approaches.
Pauses next to the box with the GOLD CYLINDERS.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Grigory dangles like a marionette in a new surge of energy.
Even the skeptical Von Krupt is in thrall.
The NAZI SCIENTIST reaches for a second GOLD CYLINDER.
But something else lands next to him: A GRENADE!!!
The explosion blows him to pieces.
In a few seconds, the squad of Allies storms the area.
A hail of bullets cuts down a dozen Nazis.
The Allies overrun the machine gun nest as grenades explode everywhere.
VON KRUPT shoots wildly, hitting Broom in the leg.
But Whitman's bullets rip into the old Nazi's chest.
Leaving a trail of blood, Broom crawls to a dead G.I.
and grabs a grenade from his belt.
TCHKKK!!!
Kroenen extends two gleaming blades from twin steel bands on his wrists and takes on an entire group of soldiers, mowing through them with swords spinning like deadly rotors.
The steel chops clean through their weapons.
Broom pulls the pin and throws the grenade at the generator.
CLICK-CLACK!!
It wedges itself between two moving tie rods.
Kroenen squeals and -- retracting his blades -- lunges after it.
The gyrating rails slice through his leather jacket.
As his fingers reach the grenade, it EXPLODES!!!
Kroenen flies through the air, hitting a stone wall, where two long pieces of shrapnel pin him like an insect.
Another rail plunges -- FFFFT!
!, like a javelin -- into the earth right next to MATLIN.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Grigory's face is distorted, pulled like ectoplasmic taffy, his body contorting and breaking.
The cosmic portal suddenly implodes!
Nothing is left but a few burnt rails and the metal glove, empty and smoking.
As the Allies approach, the fighting rages on.
Grigory and Ilsa are gone.
And for now, so is Kroenen.
Embedded in the wall where he was pinned, two bloody rails, nothing more.
OMIT
Allied SOLDIERS penetrate the ruins.
Matlin helps Broom up.
He picks up a sample of white, viscous goo from the outer rings of the smoking machine.
Whitman approaches.
Broom glances at a 13th century FRESCO depicting heaven and hell.
Still raining.
A group of soldiers spreads out, using flashlights to scour through the rubble.
Every one of them has a rosary hanging from the bayonet.
OMIT
Broom hastily bandages his bleeding leg.
Matlin and Whitman roam over the debris.
Rain POURS through the broken roof.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: There is a place -- a dark place where evil slumbers and awaits to return.
From there it infects our dreams.
Grigory gave us a glance tonight --

dialogue.name: MATLIN
dialogue.s: (Broom nods) Thought they were on our side...

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (beat) In 1916, at a dinner in his honor, he was poisoned, shot, stabbed, clubbed, drowned and castrated.

dialogue.name: MATLIN
dialogue.s: That makes him more than a hundred --

meta.s: A rustling sound reaches their ears.
Matlin readies a handgun as Broom scans the walls with his flashlight.
Something moves, accompanied by a loud scrape.
Matlin cocks his pistol and nervously approaches a crumbling statue.
SCREEEECH!!!!
A RED THING jumps into the air!!
Instinctively, Matlin shoots at it.
The RED THING leaps from arch to arch, followed by a trail of bullet hits.
Whitman and other soldiers join them --

dialogue.name: MATLIN
dialogue.s: (to Broom) What the hell was that?

dialogue.name: WHITMAN
dialogue.s: What are you two talking about?

meta.s: They hear the labored breathing of a living creature.

dialogue.name: MATLIN
dialogue.s: It's got a big stone -- in its hand --

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I think that is its hand.

meta.s: Hissing, the thing cowers between a gargoyle and a stone saint.
WHITMAN points his gun at the scarlet shape above.
Broom stops him from firing.
In deep shadow, the RED THING observes with bright, golden eyes veined with streaks of burnt sienna.
Broom slowly fishes a BABY RUTH candy bar from his pocket.
Peeling back the wrapper, he slowly waves the candy.
The RED THING shrinks back.
Broom bites into the candy and chews, noisily smacking his lips.
Offers the candy again.
This time, out of the dark comes a small FACE, not very different from the stone demons around it.
The creature extends its right arm: it's solid stone with tiny runes engraved around the thick, cylindrical wrist.
Four articulated stone fingers wiggle, reaching for the chocolate.

dialogue.name: YOUNG SOLDIER
dialogue.s: would'ya look at the size of that whammer!

meta.s: Whitman moves closer.
On the wall behind him, a shadow shows the RED THING climbing into Broom's arms.
Broom tenderly covers it with a blanket.
The stubby fingers snatch the candy.
Broom smiles.
The soldiers cluster around, curious to see it.
Matlin prepares his camera and directs them into a group shot.
Broom smiles like a proud new father and embraces the creature, patting him gently.
CLICK!!

dialogue.name: OLD MATLIN
dialogue.s: and no one has ever seen it.
They keep saying he's not real, but I want to set the record straight before I go.

meta.s: Matlin finally pulls an old 8x10 from a battered portfolio.
He smiles, full of memories.

dialogue.name: OLD MATLIN
dialogue.s: The real picture, not the retouched one in LIFE magazine.
(hands over the photograph) This is him.
The very same night we found him.
The night Broom gave him that name.
(beat) Can I say it on TV?

scene.sceneheader: EXT. INSIDE THE CHURCH - BACK TO '44 - NIGHT

meta.s: Inside the blanket, Hellboy blinks his bright golden eyes and chews candy, his devilish red tail twitching happily.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY - MAIN TITLE
dialogue.s: Montage: Tabloid covers and news clippings screaming HELLBOY SIGHTING IN RENO!!

meta.s: TV Newscasters read lurid copy.
SPRINGER excerpts (fist fight included) feature the show's theme: I WAS HELLBOY'S BRIDE!!
Some blurry, grainy footage depicts Hellboy crossing an alley.
Much like Bigfoot in the woods.

scene.sceneheader: INT. STUDIO T.V. HOST SHOW - INTERVIEW #2 - DAY

meta.s: MANNING is a balding, official-looking guy in a suit.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: With their conveniently blurry footage of their beloved "Hellboy."
And they claim that he works for the FBI-?

meta.s: HEAD OF SPECIAL OPERATIONS.
Manning on a TV SHOW a la Regis Philbin.

dialogue.name: TV HOST
dialogue.s: As the head of your division, you -- You have seen dozens of pictures like this!!

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Exactly -- so, why is it that they're all out of focus?
God knows, people manage to get good pictures at a wedding!

meta.s: He shows a blurry picture.
The audience applauds.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. HIGH MOUNTAINS, EASTERN EUROPE - DAY

meta.s: In the thick of a snowstorm, THREE FIGURES climb the icy steps of a massive rock formation.
Super: BIRGAU PASS, MOLDAVIA, PRESENT DAY.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. HIGH MOUNTAINS (SET), EASTERN EUROPE - DAY

meta.s: The THREE FIGURES move through a narrow passage until they reach a DEAD END.
FIGURE 1 stops at a symbol carved in the rocky ground and consults Grigory's LEATHER-BOUND BOOK.
The symbol matches an illustration in the book.
Before them, a thick wall of ice.
Using a heavy steel hammer, FIGURE 1 breaks through.

dialogue.name: PEASANT GUIDE
dialogue.s: I will guide you no further.

meta.s: Figure 2 produces two small GOLD INGOTS.
Hands one to the guide.
Keeps the other one.
The Guide examines his pay greedily: engraved in it: a SWASTIKA.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ICE CAVE - SMALL CORRIDOR - DAY

meta.s: The ice curtain collapses, revealing a rough-walled corridor.
FIGURE 1 spots a glowing firefly.
They follow it into --

scene.sceneheader: INT. ICE CAVE - MAIN NAVE - DAY

meta.s: A cathedral-like vault that could easily hold a stadium.
From an opening somewhere above, eerie blue light streams down on a magnificent labyrinth.
A few more fireflies speckle the air, winking on and off.
The THREE FIGURES move past cyclopean statues guarding the inhuman architecture.
The humans are dwarfed by the monumental scale of the walkways and ramparts.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ICE CAVE - CENTRAL LABYRINTH AREA - DAY

meta.s: At the center of the labyrinth the stone floor is covered in grooves radiating from a shallow stone basin.
FIGURE 3 uncovers his face: he's a PEASANT GUIDE.
FIGURE 1 exchanges a meaningful look with FIGURE 2.
FIGURE 1 throws two solid gold pieces at the feet of the Sherpa.
On them, an embossed SWASTIKA.
After a greedy moment of thought, the Peasant kneels to pick up the gold.
TCHKK!!!
A long, shiny blade pierces the Peasant's chest from behind.
He blinks twice and slumps forward.
FIGURE 2 steps out from behind him, a long, bloody blade in his hand.
The figures uncover their faces.
ILSA has not aged and KROENEN, still wears the same tight gas mask.
He cleans his blade in the snow and takes back the gold.
Ilsa watches the Sherpa's blood as it runs in a steaming rivulet, tracing a glyph in the grooves and filling the basin.
A FIGURE RISES FROM THE BLOOD.
A naked human shape, haloed by fireflies.

dialogue.name: ILSA
dialogue.s: What did they do to your eyes?

meta.s: Mechanized rollers transport X-Ray films over a backlit screen.
A group of 4 DOCTORS studies the pictures and exchanges somber looks.
Rain spatters the windows.
Doctor 1 glances at the others.
Doctor 2 looks through a glass partition at an aged but dignified BROOM, 72, who slowly buttons his shirt.
Hanging from his wrist, his rosary.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DOCTORS OFFICE - EXAMINATION ROOM - DAY

dialogue.name: DOCTOR 2
dialogue.s: In the lungs... the spine, liver...

meta.s: Broom impassively takes in the information.

dialogue.name: DOCTOR 2
dialogue.s: I can arrange for hospitalization, pain management.

meta.s: Broom pensively shuffles his tarot cards.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (shakes his head) I'd rather... stay home, you know.
I'll be making arrangements -- (beat) For my son.

dialogue.name: DOCTOR 2
dialogue.s: You can always get a second opinion.

meta.s: Broom looks down: first card off the deck: DEATH.
Leaves stir on the pavement.
All the stores are decorated for Halloween.
Two kids dressed as SKELETONS run in front of Broom, carrying a JACK-O-LANTERN.
Leaning on a cane, Broom exits the building and walks toward a waiting black Mercedes.
The DRIVER (Agent Lime) opens the door.
Broom pauses to buy a dozen BABY RUTH candy bars from a street vendor.
In an ELECTRONICS STORE, a wall of TV's.
The image of a RED, BLURRY SHAPE (HELLBOY) fills the screens.

dialogue.name: TV HOST
dialogue.s: Mister Manning, what about the "Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense?"
The FBI has been known to conceal --

dialogue.name: TOM MANNING
dialogue.s: Phil -- Phil -- hold your little green horses.
Let me tell you and the American public one thing -- this "Bureau for -- what was it?

dialogue.name: TOM MANNING
dialogue.s: -- Defense, right, well -- I'm here to clear up this once and for all.

meta.s: Broom smiles.
OMIT
On a wooded, new jersey hill, a low-slung, high-tech complex rests at the edge of a bluff, its foundation fused with the rock below.

dialogue.name: SUPER: BUREAU FOR PARANORMAL RESEARCH AND DEFENSE, NEWARK,

scene.sceneheader: EXT. B.P.R.D. COMPLEX - GATE ENTRANCE - DAY

meta.s: A dolled-up MOD-STYLE moped stops at the massive gate.
Strapped to the luggage rack are two cheap suitcases.
The driver, a very wet YOUNG MAN named MYERS, touches an old fashioned buzzer under a sign reading "WASTE MANAGEMENT" A crackling INTERCOM VOICE answers.
A beat, then -- WHIRRR!!!
An EYEPIECE and an LCD screen scanner pop out.
Myers looks into the eyepiece.
On the screen, Myers' cornea is scanned.
TWO VIOLET FLASHES.
His ID and badge numbers appear.
CLACK!
The gate opens.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. UPHILL ROAD - THE MOPED - DAY

meta.s: The moped putt-putts towards the building in the distance.
Seated at a dramatic circular desk is a solitary guard.
Myers approaches.
Confused, Myers picks up his suitcases and complies.
He realizes he's DEAD CENTER on a giant B.P.R.D.
Logo: A HAND HOLDING A SWORD.
Immediately, the floor under Myers' feet starts down.
He's on a small elevator.

scene.sceneheader: INT./EXT. OPEN ELEVATOR - ON THE WAY DOWN - DAY

meta.s: The panel overhead slides shut.
A row of safety lights comes on.
He's in a vast underground area with other elevators moving up and down in the distance.
The elevator stops in a narrow, dark space.
Neon lights flicker on, illuminating a circular chamber.
PAINTED on the floor is a huge number: 51.
Right in front of Myers: a magnificent oak door.
Myers knocks on it.
No answer.
Myers enters.
Myers looks around, fascinated: books.
An office made of them.
The soft glow of green-shaded reading lamps bathes everything in an intimate, warm light.
One entire wall is a thick pane of glass, the wall of a huge tank of water.
A VOICE crackles through an intercom next to the tank.
Myers jumps, then moves closer to the glass.

dialogue.name: VOICE
dialogue.s: Over here... if you don't mind?

meta.s: In the tank, ABE SAPIEN, a FISH-MAN glides in and out view.
Myers looks at four BOOK STANDS facing the glass.
Each supports an open volume.
He leans close to the glass, peering intently.
Abe reappears.
He is slender, dolphin gray, with dark patterns streaking his soft skin.
Bright blue eyes shine with intelligence.
Behind a thin wound-like mouth, gills are bubbling.
Abe nods.
Through a side door, Broom enters.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Every day -- as long as I'm here to turn the pages.

meta.s: Myers extends his hand in greeting --
BAM!
Abe presses his webbed hand against the glass, closes his eyes -- all three lids.
Abe's voice surges from the speaker.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: Agent John T. Myers, Kansas City, 76.
"T" stands for Thaddeus, mother's older brother.
Scar on your chin happened when you were ten, you still wonder if it's ever going to fade away.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Discovered alive in a secret chamber at St. Trinian's Foundling Hospital, Washington.

meta.s: Points at a small piece of antique paper, framed on the wall.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: They took his name from this little inscription that was stuck on his tank.

meta.s: Broom uncovers a tray by the tank: Four greenish eggs.
Myers gags and reels back.
Abe smiles and takes a subaquatic bow, gracefully nabbing the eggs as they float through the hatch.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: How does he know so much about me?

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Abe possesses a unique frontal lobe.
That's a word you'll hear quite a bit around here.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: As you entered the lobby there was an inscription --

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Do you remember what it said?

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: "In the absence of light, darkness prevails."
For there are things that go bump in the night, Agent Myers.
(smiles) We are the ones who bump back.

meta.s: OMIT
Myers and Broom walk down a corridor.
The walls are lined with glass cases containing occult artifacts.
Myers eyes a MUMMIFIED HAND, a CLAY GOLEM, a sumptuous PAGAN ALTAR...

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: 1937: Hitler joins "The Thule Society" -- a group of German aristocrats obsessed with the occult.

meta.s: He points to an ANCIENT, BROKEN LANCE.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: 1938: he acquires the Spear of Longinus, which pierced the body of Christ.
He who holds it becomes invincible.

meta.s: He gestures at an ancient LANCE.
Next to it: a silver and gold reliquary.
They go through a series of pneumatic doors.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: In 1943, President Roosevelt decides to fight back.
THE BUREAU FOR PARANORMAL RESEARCH AND DEFENSE is born.

meta.s: Workmen are replacing two of the doors.
Big dents from an oversized fist have deformed the 2-inch thick metal plates.
Myers stares.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: 1958, the occult war finally ends when Adolf Hitler dies.

meta.s: They reach a FINAL DOOR.
Stainless steel, like a BANK VAULT.
Waiting there is AGENT CLAY, a burly guy in a suit, with a cartful of BEEF AND MASHED POTATOES.
A dinner pile at least 4 feet high.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Agent Myers, this is Agent Clay.

meta.s: Broom hands Myers two BABY RUTH bars and walks away.
Broom signals "no."

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I hand-picked you from a roster of over seventy academy graduates.

meta.s: The door closes behind him.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: You saw the fish man, right?

meta.s: Myers nods.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Well, come on in and meet the rest of the family.

meta.s: Clay uses an odd-shaped ELECTRONIC KEY to unlock the door.
Three solenoid locks turn.
Two steel vertical PISTONS open up.
Clay pushes the cart into a solid concrete bunker, windowless, austere except for a few SAMURAI suits of ARMOR and WEAPONS.
Dozens of CATS wander around; others are curled up on the furniture.
There are Zippo's everywhere, from every era.
On a sofa (made from the bed of a pickup truck) is a heap of blankets and comic books.
All in all, a MEGA BACHELOR PAD.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: (sotto voce) He gets fed six times a day.
He's got a thing for cats.
You'll be his nanny, his keeper, his best friend.

meta.s: Clay points at a torn comic book: HELLBOY, THE UNCANNY.
Myers picks it up, looks at the cover: it shows Hellboy -- in a U.S.
Uniform, fighting a monstrous ape.
Myers watches, amazed, as a bright red TAIL waves in and out of a pool of light about ten feet away.
One of the cats playfully paws at it.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Those comics -- They never got the eyes right.

meta.s: The voice is a deep baritone, chesty and powerful.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Sixty years old by our count.
But he doesn't age like we do -- think dog years: He's barely out of his teens.

meta.s: Myers gasps, seeing a monumental figure in the shadows, exercising with a 300 lb.
Stainless steel DUMBBELL.
Crimson biceps like cooked hams.
Chomping an unlit CIGAR stub.
Agent Clay blushes as he hides his scalp.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Where do you want your dinner, Red?

meta.s: On a nearby pile of junked TV sets, a loop of Fleischer cartoons and home movies cycles endlessly.
One subject appears over and over: an ATTRACTIVE YOUNG WOMAN with a pale face and raven-black hair.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Agent Myers is your new liaison.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: I'll be around, Red, just back in the field.

meta.s: BANG!!!
Hellboy lets the dumbbell drop.
Instinctively, Myers jumps.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Manning says I'm too soft on you -- (sotto voce, nudging Myers) The candy.

meta.s: Myers remembers he's holding the Baby Ruths.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: You got yourself on TV again.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: (sotto to Myers) Try not to stare.

meta.s: Hellboy finally enters the light.
He's awe-inspiring, with chiseled features, patterned red skin and deep-set golden eyes.
Involuntarily, Myers recoils.
In spite of himself, Myers is staring at the horn stumps.
An ALARM sounds, and a red light blinks on the wall.
Myers looks around, bewildered.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: You're taking me for a walk!

meta.s: An imposing four-story structure, all pillars and pediments.
A HALLOWEEN BANNER advertises: MAGICK: THE ANCIENT POWER.
Super: THE MACHEN LIBRARY, MANHATTAN Chaos near the entrance: policemen, TV reporters, MOUNTED POLICE.
Loud protests from the reporters as a line of black sedan cars are waved through.

dialogue.name: BLONDE REPORTER
dialogue.s: The NYPD has yet to issue a statement.
We've got SWAT vans, paramedics, you name it... and now here's -- a garbage truck -- (double take) -- a garbage truck?

meta.s: Trailing behind the cars, a GARBAGE TRUCK.
On its side a mirrored sign reads: SQUEAKY CLEAN INC.
Waste Management Services.

scene.sceneheader: INT./EXT. GARBAGE TRUCK - LIBRARY STREET ENTRANCE - NIGHT

meta.s: AN AGENT is driving the truck, with MYERS at his side.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. MACHEN LIBRARY - STREET ENTRANCE - NIGHT

meta.s: The crowd parts like the Red Sea for the garbage truck.
Dozens of faces are reflected in the truck's mirrored logo.
A MOUNTED POLICEMAN rides past the mirrored sides of the truck.

scene.sceneheader: INT./EXT. GARBAGE TRUCK LAB - LIBRARY CROWD - NIGHT

meta.s: The MOUNTED POLICEMAN is visible as he rides by.
The mirrors are see-through.
The back of the truck is a fully-equipped crime lab, crammed with hi-tech gear and low-tech talismans.
ABE fits a respirator over his face.
It looks like a mechanized Elizabethan collar.
Valves bubble and hiss as he inhales liquid through his mouth and out his gills.
Hellboy looks out onto the CROWD.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Look at them ugly suckers, Blue.
One sheet of glass between them and us.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: I break it, they see us, Happy Halloween.

meta.s: Hellboy straps on a huge utility belt heavy with amulets, rosaries, horseshoes.
From an ashtray he grabs a handful of stogie stubs.
Lights one, puts the rest in a pouch.
Hellboy unlocks a STEEL BOX (STENCILED ON ITS LID: "THE GOOD SAMARITAN") and extracts the meanest-looking, custom-built, double-barrel, blue-finished, handgun ever made.
A veritable cannon.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: How am I ever gonna get a girl??
I drive around in a garbage truck

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (hefting the gun) We don't take hints.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. COURTYARD / LOADING DOCK MACHEN LIBRARY - NIGHT

meta.s: The GARBAGE TRUCK pulls into an interior courtyard and stops.
FBI/BPRD teams spread through the area, expelling uniformed cops and securing the doors.
THREE AGENTS -- QUARRY, STONE and MOSS -- close a gate, sealing off the area.
From a nearby roof, Agent Lime signals all clear.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: (into a handheld radio) Seal the doors.
Red and Blue are coming in.

meta.s: The truck stops, Clay pulls a lever.
Myers watches as the dumpster loader hinges down like a drawbridge, revealing HELLBOY and ABE.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Okay, boys, let's synch up our locators.

meta.s: Abe, Clay and Hellboy activate lights on their belts.
They BEEP and blink.
Hellboy starts walking.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY, MAIN LOBBY - NIGHT

meta.s: As BPRD agents clear the area, Clay, Myers, Abe and Hellboy march through the main lobby.
On view, various display cases.
Two BANNERS flank the marble staircase.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: (reading a report) At nineteen hundred hours an alarm tripped.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Hold on -- hold on -- I thought we checked this place.

meta.s: Broom stands at the base of the marble staircase.
Myers observes as the red Goliath sheepishly averts his gaze from that of the fragile old man.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MAIN CORRIDOR / MACHEN LIBRARY (SET) - NIGHT

meta.s: They approach an oversize set of brass doors.
Abe removes a leather glove from his hand.
FWAP!!
he spreads his webbed fingers on the door.
He closes his three eyelids and concentrates.
Two agents arrive with a rolling munitions case.
Myers observes as Hellboy opens it and looks over a potpourri of bullets of all colors and shapes.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Smuggled into this country by an overzealous curator.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: The Vatican deemed its contents dangerous enough to include it on the List of Avignon.
Of which we hold a copy.

meta.s: Hellboy selects a clip full of bullets and a speed loader.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Holy water, silver shavings, white oak: the works.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: (pulling his hand away) Behind this door.
A dark entity -- Evil, ancient and hungry.

meta.s: Abe quickly starts scanning a few leather-bound volumes of ancient magic.
As HELLBOY opens the big doors, a flickering amber glow illuminates him.
He steps inside.
BLUE emergency lamps are on.
The exhibits are destroyed; piles of debris are burning.
Hellboy walks past a fallen display case.
He moves around cautiously.
A couple of large carvings and statues startle him.
On the floor: boots, half chewed.
Bitten belts and shreds of uniforms and hats.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (whispers into radio) Blue: It stinks in here -- Finely aged roadkill.

meta.s: The sickening sound of snapping bones and mastication reaches his ears.
Hellboy reacts to a smell, raises his eyes to discover -- A huge pale CREATURE hangs from the ceiling, chewing slowly.
SAMMAEL: equipped with powerful arms, a head full of tentacles and two well-muscled hind legs.
Most of its face is hidden, but the jaws are shiny with blood.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Man, you're gonna need some heavy fiber to move that out --

scene.sceneheader: INT. MAIN CORRIDOR / MACHEN LIBRARY (SET) - NIGHT

meta.s: Abe has found a small, medieval engraving of Sammael in one of the books.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: There's not much here: the entity's name is Sammael, the desolate one, son of Nergal --

meta.s: Sammael releases himself, lands on the floor.
Part of the neck is exposed: white, slimy skin, cracked like old marble and criss- crossed with blue veins.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Hold it -- (beat) Hey, Sammy, whaddayasay we work this out??
I'm not a great shot, but -- (raises his gun) "The Samaritan" here, uses really big bullets, so whadyasay we work this out?

meta.s: Sammael stands and turns around -- CRACK-KKK!!!
His waist twists him 360 degrees!!
Screeching, Sammael leaps away!!!
Hellboy shoots.
The high-caliber ammo rips a few columns apart and finally catches Sammael.
The bullet goes through it and destroys a statue and a large window behind him.
The monster squeals and goes down.
With a rattling cough, it grows still.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - MAGIK EXHIBIT HALL - NIGHT

dialogue.name: ABE'S VOICE
dialogue.s: (in earpiece) Red -- you need to hear the rest of the information --

meta.s: Hellboy turns away for a moment.
Puts his gun away, like a gunslinger.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - EXHIBIT CORRIDOR DOORS - NIGHT

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: No, listen this: Sammael, the desolate one, lord of the shadows, son of Nergal --

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - MAGIK EXHIBIT HALL - NIGHT

meta.s: Hellboy looks back at the corpse: it's gone!

dialogue.name: ABE'S VOICE
dialogue.s: harbinger of pestilence, seed of destruction --

meta.s: BAMMM!!
From out of nowhere, Sammael appears and swings an arm!!
Hellboy CRASHES into the brass doors!

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - EXHIBIT CORRIDORS - NIGHT

meta.s: The doors bulge and crack under Hellboy's impact.
Abe and Broom backpedal fast.
Myers pulls out his gun, and starts looking for another way in.
Broom observes this, pleased.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - MAGIK EXHIBIT HALL - NIGHT

meta.s: Sammael lashes out with a massive punch.
HELLBOY goes K-KKRASH!!!
K-KKRASH!!!
through SIX glass cabinets, then hits a window, falling --

scene.sceneheader: EXT. AN ALLEY - BEHIND MACHEN LIBRARY - NIGHT

meta.s: -- two stories down, landing sideways in an industrial garbage bin.
Hellboy fights to stay conscious.
Blood drips from his mouth
Hellboy looks up: standing in the alley, like an apparition, is Grigory, in a black suit and overcoat, his eyes shielded by pitch-black sunglasses
Hellboy's in shock, confused.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: I sang the first lullaby you ever heard, my child.
I ushered you into this world.
(beat) I alone know your true calling, your true name.

meta.s: Hellboy catches sight of his big gun, lying on the ground.
He goes for it but, BAMMM!!!!
SAMMAEL lands before him.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: I can see that you're still young and don't know your place.

meta.s: Before Hellboy can reach the weapon -- WSHHHP!!!
A 7-foot tongue lashes out from Sammael's mouth like a whip.
It's arm-thick, with yellow sacs billowing from its sides.
It wraps around Hellboy's right arm.
Hellboy falls to the ground, writhing, grinding his teeth.
The tongue squeezes and pulls.
Smoke pours from Hellboy's skin.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. AN ALLEY - BEHIND MACHEN LIBRARY - NIGHT

meta.s: Then -- BANG!
BANG!
BANG!
Myers appears at the end of the alley, firing round after round into Sammael's tongue.
AMBER BLOOD explodes in the air.
The tongue recoils with an infernal SQUEAL!!
Hellboy manages to roll away.
Myers goes for HELLBOY's gun... and grabs it!
He takes cover behind the trash container.
HELLBOY is there.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: What do you think you're doing?

meta.s: Myers proudly shows him the gun.
He grabs his gun and tries to reload, but his arm hurts too much.
He hands him the gun and a fresh clip.
Reaching into his belt, Hellboy extracts a vacuum-sealed packet.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (throws it at Myers) -- Then load this.

meta.s: In the packet: A SINGLE BULLET.
KLANG!!!
The tongue punches through the steel like a ramrod.
Again and again... Hellboy and Myers can barely dodge it.
Myers cracks a safety pin.
The glass head on the bullet glows like a chemical flare.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Jeez... What the hell is that?

meta.s: He's looking at Hellboy's smoking arm.
Inside a bloody gash, a big, black stinger is gleaming.
Hellboy pulls it out, then steps on it.
It pops like a ripe grape.
Hellboy steps from behind the container.
Sammael's tongue instantly wraps around the gun's muzzle.
BAM!
BAM!
Hellboy shoots repeatedly.
His face lit weirdly green as the tracking bullet lodges within the gun.
Then -- BAM!!!

dialogue.name: INSIDE GUN SHOT
dialogue.s: The glowing bullet flies through the barrel and out towards --

meta.s: -- Sammael, still in mid-air.
It hits him square in the chest: an explosion of green goo!!
With a shriek, the thing leaps over a wall.
Hellboy scrambles after it.
On the empty sidewalk, Hellboy sees a trail of GLOWING GOOP.
He hits full stride, following it around a corner.
Myers lands a second later, cradling his arm, chasing after him.

dialogue.name: LOADING DOCK / ALLEY
dialogue.s: Sammael dashes by, followed closely by Hellboy, running full tilt.

meta.s: A ten-wheeler backs up, effectively blocking their way.
A few workers load pumpkin boxes in it.
Without slowing down, Sammael jumps onto the trailer, denting the roof then jumping off and into a CROWDED CARNIVAL area.
A small carrousel and refreshment stand flank a pumpkin patch.
Full of curiosity, Sammael pauses a second to inspect a Trick- or-treater dressed as a GOLDEN DRAGON.
Hellboy catapults himself onto the trailer's roof.
Hellboy jumps and lands heavily on top of the driver's cab: CRASH!!!
The driver is almost crushed under the steel.
He screams, showered by thousands of glass shards.
Myers is a few steps behind.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: (into headset) We'll hit the street in a minute.

meta.s: He squeezes between the vehicle and the alley wall.
The vendors are yelling at him.
Sammael runs past a group of trick-or-treaters, and jumps straight into the street.
Cars swerve, avoiding a collision as Sammael lands on the opposite sidewalk.
The TRICK OR TREATERS scream.
Hellboy appears.
He too dives straight into the traffic as Myers follows -- He runs into the road... and a 4X4 speeds straight at him!
Seeing this, Hellboy runs back, and lands next to Myers, holds out his STONE HAND and stops the 4x4 dead in its tracks.
The impact somersaults the car over them both.
It lands with a thud on the street, air bags exploding.
Myers almost faints.
Other cars stop, tires squealing and horns blaring.
A major traffic jam.
Myers opens his eyes, nods.
He moves after Sammael.
OMIT
Hellboy follows the GLOWING GOOP into an adjacent alley.
At the far end he sees a metal grate has been moved.
Sammael's gone.
He comes up to the opening, then jumps in.
He lands on a subway track.
Sammael is a few yards away.
Seated.
A train horn blares.
A headlight approaches!!
Hellboy smiles and puts away his gun.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Uh-oh -- between a rock and a hard place --

meta.s: But Sammael sprints towards it!
Sammael unhinges a long, scythe-like bone from his forearm, then jumps at the front car --
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. STUNT TRACKS / FRONT 1/4 CAR - NIGHT

meta.s: smashing through glass and steel and raining sparks.
Landing inside with a ROAR!!!

scene.sceneheader: EXT./INT. THE SUBWAY - 2 TRAIN CAR SET - NIGHT

meta.s: SAMMAEL's tongue punches through the doors as he races through one -- two -- passenger cars and out the --

dialogue.name: STUNT TRACK REAR 1/4 CAR
dialogue.s: -- rear of the train, back onto the tracks.

meta.s: Landing there safely.

scene.sceneheader: INT. THE SUBWAY TRACKS (STUNT TRACK) - NIGHT

meta.s: Now the train hurtles at Hellboy, who grimaces and does his best --
He leaps, but HUMPF!!
He's hit!
His legs rattle over the tracks.

scene.sceneheader: INT. UNDERCARRIAGE - STUNT TRACKS - FRONT 1/4 CAR - NIGHT

meta.s: Inches from the wheels, he punches his stone hand through the steel floor and grabs a handhold.
Steam and sparks explode everywhere.
The TRAIN DRIVER grabs a fire extinguisher and starts slamming it against Hellboy's head.
BAMMM!!!
He goes under!!
The train whizzes overhead, grazing his horn stumps, making sparks fly!!
After the train passes, Hellboy sits up, forehead smoking.
Sammael is gone.
A trail of GOOP is glowing.
He follows it, until it ends abruptly.
He looks ahead: no trace of Sammael... Then a fat drop of glowing goop hits his hand.
He looks up.
Sammael hangs from the ceiling, then drops.
Then the creature lifts Hellboy in a ferocious bear hug.
Hellboy twists around and cracks open the jaws of the creature, like King Kong and the T-Rex.
Sammael staggers back and -- in an impossible maneuver, re- knits his jaws together!
Then he uses his bone scythe to tackle Hellboy and -- TCHAKKKK!!
-- pin his shoulder down.
A deep wound.
Sammael's mouth starts to open!
Hellboy looks at the sparking THIRD RAIL a few feet away.
Sammael's tongue rears back, a snake ready to strike.
Hellboy grabs the rail.
An electrical discharge consumes both creatures and burns the frame like flashpaper.
Hellboy lets go, his hand and body smoking.
Sammael -- very crispy -- is convulsing in a cloud of smoke.
He grows still.
Wreathed in smoke, Hellboy shakes off the shock and uses a flame on his arm to light a cigar.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (puffs smoke, kicks the body) You weren't.

meta.s: OMIT
A huge traffic jam clogs the highway.
The totalled 4X4 is being TOWED AWAY.
Several TV CREWS interview witnesses.
Myers -- his arm freshly bandaged -- signs a police form.
His radio beeps.
Myers moves away from the POLICE OFFICERS.
Hellboy walks away from the smoking Sammael carcass.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Wait -- Wait -- You can't go anywhere -- I gotta go with you --

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: No, no, no, it's fine: I do my job, I take a break.

dialogue.name: MYERS (V.O.)
dialogue.s: Don't do this -- Listen to me -- Tell me where you are --

meta.s: He turns off his belt locator and moves away into the darkness of the tunnel.
In the foreground: BLACK light escapes from Sammael's charred body.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MAIN ABANDONED BATHS ALCOVE - NIGHT

meta.s: An abandoned shower room.
A series of sinks and stalls, lined with dirty white tile.
A phonograph nearby plays Wagner.
Kroenen stands next to it.
ILSA is nearby, a straight razor glinting in her hand.
She stands over Grigory -- his back to us -- lovingly shaving her master's scalp.
She grabs two GLASS EYES from a table.
Places them in Grigory's sockets -- his back to us -- as he turns, a glass eye shifts lazily into position.
He opens his hand: in it the pale BLACK light that escaped from Sammael's body.
He cradles it like a precious stone.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Die in peace and be reborn again and again...

meta.s: He closes his fist.

dialogue.name: ILSA
dialogue.s: Only seven more days to the eclipse, Grishka...

meta.s: Rasputin stands, his neck and shoulders rising, engorged by moving flesh beneath his human skin.
Ilsa stares in fascination.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: And so will we all -- Won't we?

meta.s: Behind him, in the darkness of a tunnel: TWO SAMMAEL silhouettes appear.
OMIT
A sleek black limo drives past the crowd and stops outside.
FBI agent TOM MANNING emerges.
Manning and Broom walk through the mess.
A crew is cleaning up.
The dead guards are carried out.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Every time the media get a look at him, they come to me.
I'm running out of lies, Trevor.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I thought you liked being on TV.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Tom -- he's our guest, not a prisoner.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Your "guest" happens to be six foot five, bright red, and is government funded.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: He's just going through a phase --

meta.s: Manning moistens and lights a fine cigar, using a kitchen match.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: What do you think this is, "The Brady Bunch?"

meta.s: ABE SAPIEN listens while pacing the exhibition hall, palm open.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: (lowers his voice, tense) These freaks, Trevor, they give me the creeps.
And I'm not the only one.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I know where to find him.

meta.s: Manning watches as Abe finds a sharp dagger embedded in the floor.
Abe silences him.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: I need to touch it to "see"...

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: The past, the future, whatever this object holds.

meta.s: Abe holds the dagger in his hand, turns to Broom.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: You mind sharing your mystic insights?

meta.s: Broom examines the dagger: a RAGNAROK symbol crowns the hilt.
The dragon and swastika.
He solemnly extends his hand.
As soon as Abe takes it, the room...
MORPHS TO:
Hours earlier: the place is intact.
Both ABE and BROOM witness spectrally as -- A GUARD CHECKS AN ALARM MONITORING UNIT.
HEARING A ticking sound, he shines his light into a dark corner: no one's there.
But after the guard moves on, a spidery form emerges from the pool of shadows on the floor.
It's KROENEN, encased in shiny BLACK LATEX from head to toe.
On his chest, a close-fitting harness comprised of softly ticking gears.
He approaches a glass case which holds an ancient WOODEN STATUE of an Eastern Orthodox SAINT.
Then, on the glass, a reflection: ILSA.
She uses her hammer to destroy the glass case.
The ALARM shrieks.
Warning lights come on.
Kroenen pulls out a double-ended BLADE.
It spins, like a giant bone saw, slicing across the statue.
No apparent damage until: CRACKKKKK!!!
a diagonal line appears and the top half falls.
KROENEN reaches for a small crank embedded in his chest and winds himself up.
Ilsa reaches into a hollow portion in the wooden statue and removes a large reliquary jar containing Golden sand.
Six guards hurry in.
They point their flashlights and guns at Kroenen.
Kroenen starts shaking, as if in a seizure and readies two TWIN BLADES.
bullet tears into Kroenen's arm, spewing forth an explosion of dust.
He turns.
The guards shoot again.
Kroenen maneuvers the steel, deflecting the bullets which -- -- ricochet wildly -- and finally hit three of the guards.
They fall silently to the floor.
Kroenen dispatches two more in a flurry of knives.
The last guard raises his gun.
Something is clearly stopping him.
His hand breaks, twisted by an unseen force!!
The flesh on his neck pushes upwards, held by an invisible force.
He starts floating in mid-air.
The blinking lights of arriving police cars tint the windows red and amber.
They outline a figure formerly submerged in shadows.
GRIGORY.
He gestures with both hands, as if holding an imaginary doll.
His arm muscles twitch under his skin, shifting, changing, gaining strength.
With a quick gesture Grigory twists the lower and upper parts of the guard's body in opposite directions.
With a wet CRUNCH, the guard's shadow on the wall goes limp.
Grigory looks at Ilsa.
Ilsa opens the reliquary jar and pours a circle of sand onto the floor.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Gathered from the tears of a thousand martyrs.
Restraining the essence of Sammael, the hell hound, the seed of destruction.

meta.s: Grigory slices the air with his open hand, creating fleeting glyphs... and a small BLACK flame dances on his open palm.
He deposits it in mid-air, at the center of the circle.
Then, the sand begins to move, like liquid mercury.
Lines fuse into a pile.
It melts and bubbles, growing and foaming.
Bones are formed, tendons and ligaments join together, GROWING, GROWING, INTO SAMMAEL.
It roars!!
OMIT
Abe snaps out of it.
Broom is pale.
He steps away, wincing, enduring a bolt of pain in his side.
Abe holds him.
Motions for the others to stay back.
He extends his open palm and "feels" the air near the old man's back.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I don't want Hellboy to know --

meta.s: Broom turns around, gently pushes Abe's hand away.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Sixty years ago Abe, they tried to destroy the world.
And they are back -- in my lifetime, they are back.

meta.s: A small nighttime Halloween celebration.
Lanterns hanging from the trees, couples drinking and listening to Pop music on picnic tables.
On a bench, A YOUNG GUY pulls out a cold SIX PACK of beer and passionately kisses his GIRLFRIEND.
As he shuts his eyes, a bright, red tail neatly snatches the six-pack.
Behind the bench, HELLBOY smiles.
Dry leaves fly up in a gust of wind.
A small army of EMERGENCY VEHICLES roars down the deserted streets, right past a... ...brick 1940's HOSPITAL, behind a high wall topped with barbed wire.
The mesh-covered windows are decorated with paper skeletons and jack-o'-lanterns.
A topiary garden surrounds the building.
Watching from atop the wall is HELLBOY.
One sleeve of his overcoat is soaked in blood.
He keeps an eye on the SECOND FLOOR windows.
Hanging from his tail: THE SIX PACK OF BEER.
DOCTOR MARSH, a female psychiatrist, moves down a line patients, distributing pills.
Behind her, a lithe young woman in a patient's gown carries the medicine tray.
This is LIZ SHERMAN, age 26, her pale skin contrasting with her raven-black hair and piercing dark eyes.
A scar mars her forehead.
Three thick rubber bands circle her wrist.
Near a window, a Down's Syndrome PATIENT senses something.

dialogue.name: DOWN'S PATIENT
dialogue.s: (pointing) There's a big red guy down there!

dialogue.name: DOCTOR MARSH
dialogue.s: (readying more pills) That's fine, darling, Santa's not here for another month.

meta.s: Hearing this, Liz stops.
She closes her eyes, tugs at one of the rubber bands on her wrist and lets it snap against her skin.
She winces and peers out the window.
The garden below seems empty.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - GARDEN AREA - NIGHT

meta.s: Liz steps out a side door into the hospital garden.
Hanging from her neck: an old POLAROID CAMERA.
She follows a trail of blood to a large, thorny bush.
As she circles it...
Visible in the branches, a leg and part of Hellboy's overcoat.
His tail emerges, dangling the six-pack.
Liz shoots a Polaroid.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: To wash down my lithium pills?
(beat) I may get a few perks, H.B.

meta.s: Shyly, he climbs out from the bush.
She sees the bloody arm.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: You better have that looked at.

meta.s: Liz sighs.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - GARDEN AREA- NIGHT

meta.s: Hellboy's sitting on a bench, next to Liz.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: We miss you at the Bureau.
And Father's still mad at me -- (Liz smiles) Come back, Liz.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: It's been months since I've had an episode.

meta.s: Around her right hand a faint BLUE AURA of fire blooms, crawling over her fingers like a velvet haze.
She stares at the pale flame.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: I'm learning where it comes from.
(beat) And for once in my life I'm not afraid.

meta.s: She clenches her fist and puts the flame out.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: Looks like your ride is here.

meta.s: The garbage truck and the two black sedan cars have pulled into the hospital grounds.
A dozen agents climb out of the vehicles.

dialogue.name: ANGLE - THE CARS - CONTINUOUS
dialogue.s: Clay starts towards Hellboy, but Myers stops him and turns to Broom:

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (cuts him off) Then he should make it his business to change that.

dialogue.name: ANGLE - THE BENCH - CONTINUOUS
dialogue.s: Liz stands up, puts her hand on his shoulder.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: I've got a chance out here.
If you truly care about me, don't come back anymore.

meta.s: Hellboy smiles sadly.
She walks away.
She doesn't turn back.
Feeling light-headed, he stands up.
On the bench and at his feet, a pool of his own blood.
He sees Myers tentatively approaching.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: What are you, a Boy Scout?

meta.s: Hellboy drops to his knees.
Clay, Quarry and Moss reach him.
Help him up.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: You look a little woozy, there.

meta.s: Liz stands at the hospital door and sees Hellboy keel over.
A few of the agents help him to the vehicles.
Myers looks back at Liz.
They hold each others' gaze, their unfamiliar faces filled with curiosity.
Eventually, she goes inside.
OMIT
In the depths of the B.P.R.D infirmary, Hellboy lies flat on a stainless steel table.
Broom sits alongside him.
Abe peers through a magnifier at Hellboy's wounded arm.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: You were burned by some organic acid.

meta.s: Using a scalpel, Abe probes the gash.
Hellboy lets out a GRUNT.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: There's more at stake than ever before.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: I punched the crap out of that thing that he sent -- ouch!

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Well, I won't be around forever, you know?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Oh, stop that -- (grimaces in pain) Damn!

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: How long was it latched onto you?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: I dunno, maybe five seconds -- ow!

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: You want me to hold him down?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (snickers) That's right, Stud, hold me down.

meta.s: Broom moves to Abe's side of the table.
Abe is poking at the depths of the wound.
Broom comes closer, eyes wide: inside the wound on Hellboy's forearm, nestled like ticks, are 3 translucent EGGS.
Hellboy jumps as Abe plucks the first one out.
Abe deposits it in a glass container.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Didn't even buy me a drink.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MEDICAL BAY. EXAMINATION TABLE - LATER

meta.s: The computer beeps having finished an analysis.
On a monitor, an enlarged color image of one of the throbbing eggs.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: The eggs are very sensitive to heat and light.
They need a humid, dark environment to breed.

meta.s: Abe picks up an egg with a pair of tweezers, passes it on to Hellboy, who sports a bandage on his arm.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Did you ever loose track of him?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Well, let's see -- there was that moment, when I had a train on top of my head --

meta.s: Broom frowns, worried.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (to Hellboy) We can't risk it: You'll go back to the tracks tomorrow with a group of agents, search the area, top to bottom.

meta.s: Myers observes, repelled, as inside the egg a small foetal THING wiggles.
Myers stands by Broom's desk as the old man places a new set of books on the reading stands in front of the fish tank.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: I'm in way over my head, I know that much.

meta.s: At the last book stand, Broom glances at Abe, who is sitting in the shadows near the door.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: I don't know why you chose me, Sir.

meta.s: Discouraged, Myers heads for the door.
Shocked, Myers looks over at Broom.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: And as a father, I worry about him.
(directly to Myers) In medieval stories, Agent Myers, there's often a young knight, inexperienced but pure of heart...

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: What I ask from you is -- Have the courage to stand by his side after I'm gone.
(beat) He was born a Demon... You will help him become a man.

meta.s: OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. B.R.P.D. ARCHIVE / CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT

meta.s: Dozens of HELLBOY clippings flash by: tabloid headlines along with intimate images of Hellboy as a KID.
H.B.
at 7, at 12, dressed as a human for Halloween, Broom by his side.
Myers works at a computer workstation.
He brings up a small photograph in an old issue of The Enquirer.
The headline: "ARSON SUSPECT NOW WORKING FOR SECRET GOVERNMENT AGENCY" There's a photo of a woman, taken with a telephoto lens.
Another clipping: young LIZ, 11, and a photo of a tenement building burned to the ground: TRAGIC EXPLOSION.
A QUICKTIME interview pops up.
LIZ, in her early twenties.
A caption reads: ELIZABETH SHERMAN, first interview, BPRD, PYROKINETIC.
She has a POLAROID camera in her hands.
Shoots one at the lens.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: And "Pyrokinesis" sounds like psychosis or something.
Not being able to let go -- (shrug) Scary.
Sometimes you hear so-and-so lost control and just exploded.
(looks at the camera) With me -- it is.

meta.s: OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - CORRIDOR - NIGHT

meta.s: Two strolling ORDERLIES shine their flashlights inside the rooms on both sides of a long corridor.

scene.sceneheader: INT. HOSPITAL - LIZ'S ROOM, MIN. SECURITY WARD - NIGHT

meta.s: A flashlight beam sweeps Liz's room.
It illuminates a CORKBOARD covered with hundreds of Polaroids depicting scenes of everyday life.
When the beam of light crosses her face, she turns slowly, still asleep.
As the light fades, the shadows in the room grow deeper.
Grigory emerges from a dark corner.
He gazes down on the bed, extending his right hand.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: The Master is calling your name now, my girl.
We are all part of his plan.
You must return to the child...

meta.s: He gently caresses the scar on her forehead.
Under his skin, a hideous movement, a writhing rearrangement of muscles.
His fingers start to glow.
Liz convulses.
A small ripple of heat rises from her forehead.
FLASH BACK TO:
Somewhere in a smokestack city, grown-ups and kids hang banners and prepare a ragged birthday party in a cement courtyard.

dialogue.name: ANGLE - LIZ - CONTINUOUS
dialogue.s: Sitting on some tenement steps, LIZ, age 11.
Sullen, alone, a gold CRUCIFIX hanging on her chest.

meta.s: A WOMAN -- Liz's MOTHER -- comes down the courtyard steps, carrying a basket of apples.

dialogue.name: MOTHER
dialogue.s: Come on, darling, give Mummy a hand.

meta.s: Nearby, under a balloon archway, munching candy-coated apples... three KIDS giggle and point at her.
Liz turns to see them.
Liz shies away from them.
They start throwing stones.
One hits the steps.
Another misses her by inches.
A third hits her in the shoulder.
Scared, Liz turns but a rock catches her full on the face.
She falls down, blood trickling from her forehead, splattering the pavement.
She starts sobbing.
Another rock sails across, but this time, in mid-air, it catches fire and turns to ash.
A ripple of heat starts crawling up Liz's hands.
Soon a pale blue flame rings her entire arm.
Firelight glints off the crucifix.
MOTHER is dunking the apples in a pot of caramel.
A heartbreaking cry reaches her ears.
Mother sees...
Liz: outlined by licking flames!
Mother screams, horrified.
She then explodes.
A white-hot supernova engulfs the courtyard.
Her mother's body burns like flash paper.
Then the rest of the people are --

dialogue.name: THE ENTIRE TENEMENT COURTYARD
dialogue.s: -- devoured by an explosion of atomic proportions.
The four surrounding apartment blocks collapse as a shock wave hits like a wrecking ball.

meta.s: The frame whites out.
And at ground zero there is but one figure left standing: Liz... a little girl, still crying.
FLASH FORWARD TO:

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE HOSP. - LIZ'S ROOM, MIN. SEC. WARD - NIGHT

meta.s: Liz screams, her back arching, her body now in flames.
Her chest glows, silhouetting organs and ribs.
The rubber bands on her wrist vaporize.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - MIN. SEC. WARD - NIGHT

meta.s: The glow from Liz's room streams into the corridor.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - SECURITY ROOM - NIGHT

meta.s: In their glass kiosk, two ORDERLIES are listening to the radio and sharing a pizza.
A red light flashes repeatedly on a panel.
They silence the radio, grab their batons and get up.
A low rumble shakes the room.
Through the VIBRATING glass window they see...

dialogue.name: CORRIDOR MINIATURE / COMPOSITE
dialogue.s: ...A BALL OF FLAME pushing inexorably through the corridor.
The inside of the glass booth is absolutely silent, making the vision both terrifying and strangely serene.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - SECURITY ROOM (SET)- NIGHT

meta.s: As the glass explodes, the fire ROARS, drowning everything.
The orderlies hit the floor, taking cover under a shelf.
The top floor blows up.
Flame pours out of every window, showering glass into the streets below.
OMIT
Myers pushes the breakfast cart.
On it, three dozen pancakes and a mound of bacon and toast.
He opens the door to HellboyÂ´s den.
Inside, Hellboy is leaning over Broom, glaring at the old man.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: How many buildings does she have to burn?

meta.s: Myers enters, deliberately clearing his throat.
They ignore him.
Broom grows silent.
Hellboy stomps over to a mirror and -- using a hand-held belt sander -- savagely shaves his horns.
Sparks fly every time he goes at the round stumps.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Professor, that girl you were talking about --

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: I think I can help -- Talk to her -- I can bring her back.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (chuckles) What landed you this job, pushing "pamcakes"?
What was your area of expertise?

meta.s: Myers murmurs --
Hellboy's face lights up.
OMIT
Part of the building is demolished.
Repair crews and firemen are still hosing down smoldering piles of debris.
Myers arrives in a taxi cab.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - MAX. SECURITY WING - DAY

meta.s: Myers looks at LIZ through a see-through mirror.
She sits on a bench inside a padded cell.
A security CAMERA AND MONITOR records her constantly.
A worried-looking Dr. Marsh stands alongside him.

dialogue.name: DOCTOR MARSH
dialogue.s: She's been like this since it happened.
But it's put a big dent in our Thorazine supply... (dubious look at Myers) Are you sure you want to go in?

meta.s: Myers nods, loosens his tie and enters.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BELLAMIE MENTAL HOSPITAL - PADDED CELL - DAY

meta.s: Liz doesn't acknowledge Myers' presence.
He kneels and looks up at her.
Liz turns away.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: They don't feel they're capable of caring for you any longer, and --

meta.s: Silence.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Liz -- can I call you Liz?

dialogue.name: 60% OF THE WOMEN IN THIS WORLD ARE
MYERS
dialogue.s: It's still impressive by my standards: My name's John.

meta.s: She looks at him.
He offers his hand.
She looks away.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Dr. Broom asked me to invite you back to the Bureau.
No special precautions, no security escorts.
You and me in a taxi.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Miss Sherman, he's asking you back, but it's entirely your choice.

meta.s: Liz turns to the 2-way mirror.
Both their reflections are there.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: I've quit the Bureau thirteen times.
(snaps two rubber bands) Where else would I go?

meta.s: OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. BEAM TUNNEL AREA - BENJAMIN INSTITUTE - DAY

meta.s: An explosion of sound and light as a subway train passes through a dank tunnel.
Then, light beams sweep the encrusted walls and steel columns.
Clay and some B.P.R.D.
agents hold flashlights.
Two of them -- MOSS and QUARRY -- carry FLAMETHROWERS.
Hellboy and Abe bring up the rear.
They enter a store room piled high with filing cabinets, typewriters and school desks.
A turn-of-the-century mural depicts happy boys doing charitable acts.
A Latin phrase ("VIRILITER AGE") encourages them to behave like men.

dialogue.name: QUARRY
dialogue.s: (reads a map) We're in the cellar of the Benjamin Institute.
Closed since they moved the sewers in '51.

meta.s: Abe removes his gloves, hyperextends his palm and senses the air.
Then the surface of the water.
Debris and dust seem to float from the water's surface and towards Abe's hand.
They point their flashlights at a bulkhead.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: Most of the eggs are there --

meta.s: They move some filing cabinets and stare at a blank concrete wall.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: We should go back and request permission to --

meta.s: BAMMM!!!
Hellboy's stone hand cracks the concrete.
He starts pounding, again and again, like a jack hammer.

scene.sceneheader: INT. (SET/LOCATION BUILT SUGAR FACTORY) FURNACE ROOM - DAY

meta.s: Makeshift living quarters tucked below a maze of furnace ducts.
Scores of old clocks fill the room with TICKING.
At a desk, Kroenen calmly repairs a mechanical hand: his own.
His face is partly exposed.
Under his leather mask, horrible lidless eyes glitter over a skull-like grin, made of raw gums and taut skin.
As Hellboy's pounding reaches his ears, he rises, like a spider whose web has twitched.
The mechanical hand rattles blindly on the table.
He opens an ancient leather folder and extracts an engraving depicting Sammael.
Carefully places it on the table.
Then he opens a drawer and, from an envelope, takes two torn pieces of paper.
He puts them in a pouch in his belt.
The wall collapses under Hellboy's attack.
Clay smiles uncertainly back.
Hellboy moves in.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: (to Quarry and Moss) You two, check this dump, then join us --

meta.s: A large oval room of rusting metal, with pipes spilling water through a large GRATE on the floor.
Abe studies it, senses something, and nods.
With superhuman effort, Hellboy lifts it.
Hundreds of roaches pour out.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: This place would be an embarrassment.

meta.s: Below, a vast cistern.
Abe drops in two CHEMICAL FLARES.
The flares sink, illuminating floating office furniture and torn paper...

scene.sceneheader: INT. UNDERWATER CHAMBER 2 (LOCATION: R. WAREHOUSE CELLAR)

meta.s: In the lower depths, they pass shadowy industrial ruins.
Settling on the bottom they reveal the hulk of a waiting SAMMAEL.
OMIT
Abe pulls off his breathing apparatus.
Activates the locator on his utility belt.
Hellboy does likewise.
BEEEP!
The devices synchronize.
Hellboy extends a metal reliquary containing a small bone.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: This should cover your tailfin -- On loan from the Vatican, a bone from Saint Dionysius.

meta.s: Abe ties the reliquary around his hand.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: Remind me why I keep doing this.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Rotten eggs and the safety of mankind.

meta.s: As transparent nictomembrane lids cover his eyes, Abe dives.
Underwater, ABE finds an entire control room.
1940's magazines float by, like paper jellyfish.
The amber light of the chemical flares gives the room an eerie other-worldly feel.
Waiting above, Hellboy chews a Baby Ruth and pokes around.
Finds a pile of children's shoes covering some yellowing albums.
In the albums, a myriad of sad faces, the orphans from the past.
Some of the faces have been cut out.
There's an unfinished letter to Father Christmas, dated 1866.
Clay stands below a grate, admiring his hair implants with a hand mirror.
Suddenly, something moves.
Hellboy shines his light into an adjoining tunnel.
Kroenen is standing there, like a deer caught in headlights.
The figure darts away.
Hellboy tears after it, gun in hand.
Clay tries his radio.
Static.
He pulls out his gun and runs after Hellboy.
Clay arrives at an intersection of sewer tunnels.
The glow of Hellboy's flashlight is visible somewhere ahead, his booming footsteps rapidly receding.
A veritable labyrinth.

scene.sceneheader: INT. UNDERWATER CHAMBER 2 (LOCATION R. WAREHOUSE) - DAY

meta.s: Abe nears the bottom of the cistern.
As his feet touch bottom, a cloud of silt fogs the water.
He picks out a translucent egg!
Suddenly, something big glides by.
Abe turns: sees nothing.
He places the egg in a glass canister.
Now eggs are floating everywhere, undulating in the water like amber fireflies.
Abe swims slowly, collecting them one by one.
Some of them are snugly wedged between two rusty machines.
Abe's reliquary gets caught in a lever and snaps loose!!
It lands -- on a grate on the floor.
Abe swims down and tries to grab it, but it falls through.
Abe curses and stands up -- -- only to find himself FACE TO FACE with Sammael!!
The monster rakes Abe across the chest; dark blue blood begins to flow.
Abe shoves himself into a long, concrete fissure.
Sammael can't fit through, but the tongue darts out, missing Abe by inches.
Sammael scratches at the walls, trying to reach deeper, screaming in rage.
Abe screams too, emitting a trail of bubbles.
The bubbles burst on the surface.
Watching them is a SECOND SAMMAEL.
Hellboy stops, disoriented.
No trace of KROENEN.
He sniffs the air, then steps through a non-descript portal.

scene.sceneheader: INT. (LOCATION/BUILT SUGAR FACTORY) FURNACE ROOM - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy stands in Kroenen's quarters.
An array of gas masks dangle from ducts overhead.
Glued next to the walls are dozens of old photos of children.
He discovers the Sammael engraving.
Suddenly: drool drops from above: Sammael hangs from a beam.
Sammael lunges, hurling Hellboy through an open service shaft... ...and it's a long way down.
When Sammael leaps, Hellboy throws him over the edge.
Sammael, however, grabs Hellboy's tail and pulls him over the side.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. SERVICE SHAFT (NEW LOCATION SET) - DAY

meta.s: They crash through pipes, wiring and ducts and slide off down a duct and into --
another passage.
There they bounce off of dripping water pipes and jutting steel I beams, until they finally break through a mesh/insulation ceiling and directly onto --
A subway platform.
Full of people.
The two fighting creatures land on the ticket booth -- in an explosion of coins, glass and steel!!!
Some bold New Yorker in the crowd start picking up handfuls of change.
The dust clears, revealing a large crater in the platform floor.
Sammael hits Hellboy.
The Red Giant lands on a line of turnstiles, uprooting them all.
Sammael flies through the air, unfolds its bone scythe.
Hellboy rolls away.
Sammael misses: the tip imbeds itself in the floor and then -- TCHAKKK!!!
-- in a concrete column.
Sammael pulls, bringing down part of the ceiling.
More SCREAMS from the fleeing public.
A mezzanine above Hellboy collapses, bringing the ceiling, steel cables and office furniture down onto the Red Giant.
Sammael takes a step towards the crowd and roars -- Then, BAMMMMMM!!!
A desk flies up into the air.
Hellboy's stone hand emerges, triumphant.
He climbs out of the crater.
Sammael growls.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: You can do better than that.

meta.s: Hellboy rips off one of the turnstile bars and hits Sammael again and again.
Sammael blocks the last hit and throws the bar away.
It embeds itself in the tile wall.
Sammael punches Hellboy, a hard uppercut.
Hellboy flies up, crashing through the plate glass of a second mezzanine above the platform.
He skids on the tile floor, scraping a jagged line with his stone hand.
He slides past a group of BYSTANDERS and into a row of backlit subway ads.
He lands in a shower of glass and debris on a wooden bench, breaking it in two.
Sammael climbs up into the mezzanine.
Hellboy gets up -- his back bristling with glass shards -- and hears a WAIL: a YOUNG GIRL is pointing at A BOX OF KITTENS abandoned on a bench.
Sammael charges!!!
Hellboy scoops up the box, holds it high!!
Using his bone blade, Sammael pulverizes the bench.
Next, Sammael slashes at Hellboy, scattering a dozen shrieking citizens.
Illuminated by sparks and shorting lamps, Hellboy advances, blood dripping from his forehead and nose.
Hellboy starts to reload, but -- Sammael's tongue shoots out.
Hellboy throws the kitten box in the air and -- traps the tongue with his stone hand --
-- while catching the box with his tail.
The kittens are fine.
Using the tongue, he throws Sammael out a glass window.
Sammael dangles above the tracks, but he re-joints himself and grabs a handhold on the train wall above the tunnel.
From here, he pulls on Hellboy, sliding him toward the jagged glass.
Sammael pulls harder, enters the tunnel.
Hellboy fights to free himself, but his sweaty face is millimeters away from being sliced by the glass.
All seems lost, when...
WHAAAAA!!!!!!
A train appears out of nowhere heading straight for Sammael.
It splatters the thing against the tunnel wall and plows on.
Sammael's body sprawls motionless at the side of the tracks.
OMIT
He gives the cats to the young girl --
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. SUBWAY TRACKS (NEXT TO STATION) - SAME

meta.s: Hellboy approaches Sammael, whose remains are wreathed in BLACK flame.
A huge CROWD looks on from the end of the platform.
He moves away.
The BLACK flame flickers out.
Under the water, BLACK light blooms within TWO OF SAMMAEL'S EGGS as a fantastic methamorphosis starts.
The embryos burst out, gyrating in the water, swelling and distending.
Badly wounded, Abe peers from his hiding spot.
Sammael's not there.
He quickly swims to the surface, his weird blue blood trailing behind him.
The water boils with energy and BLACK LIGHT.
Abe staggers out of the pool and hides behind a crumbling shower stall.
Behind him, two SHAPES come to the surface.
Shaking, Abe pushes his belt locator and collapse

scene.sceneheader: INT. SUBWAY TRACKS (NEAR THE STATION) - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy's locator belt crackles to life.
BLUE.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BEAM-SUPPORTED UNDERGROUND TUNNEL/ STORAGE ROOM - DAY

meta.s: Back in the tunnel, Quarry and moss move filing cabinets and rotten bozes full of files.
One of them gives out and papers spill all over.
Their locators light up.
Suddenly -- a noise!
The agents leap up and sweep their flashlights over the columns...
Nothing there.

dialogue.name: QUARRY
dialogue.s: Moss, what the hell was that?

meta.s: Then, TWO SILHOUETTES cast long shadows.
Powerful footfalls boom like thunderclaps.
Agent Quarry raises his gun and fires at the dark shapes.
Useless: the things plow on.
Moss hurriedly straps on his flame thrower.
After a few seconds, a green light beeps, READY.
The muzzle of the flamethrower vomits a 30 feet long gout of fire into the blackness.
The men pause: silence!
Quarry turns on his flashlight, hand trembling.
BAM!!!
SAMMAEL'S TONGUE uncurls from the shadows and lands on Quarry's face, pulling him into the dark.
His flashlight bobbles and strobes, lighting up a nightmare: TWO SAMMAELS stand in the tunnel.
One of them gleefully squeezes Quarry.
The man's screams are muffled by the creature's fleshy lips wrapping around his head.
Moss runs as fast as he can, jumping and tumbling through an obstacle course of beams.
Turning, he readies the flamethrower.
The SECOND SAMMAEL lands on Moss's back, breaking his spine.
Hellboy enters to find Abe, bleeding but alive, leaning against the tile, blue blood all around him.
Hellboy tries his walkie-talkie.
Turns on his locator.
It sparks.
It's damaged and broken.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (into his walkie-talkie) We need an ambulance.

scene.sceneheader: INT. CENTER OF THE TUNNEL LABYRINTH (SET) - DAY

meta.s: Clay stumbles around, lost.
He stops under a grate.

dialogue.name: CLAY
dialogue.s: Clay, Code 30, this is Clay, over...

meta.s: Behind Clay, Kroenen drops down from an overhead pipe, through shafts of gray light.
He brings forth his customary long blade.
Clay turns in time to see Kroenen coming at him.
He fires.
Kroenen stabs.
Twin rivulets of blood run from Clay's nostrils.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL LABYRINTH - CONNECTING SHOWER ROOM (SET) - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy hears the gunfire, starts running.

scene.sceneheader: INT. CENTER OF THE TUNNEL LABYRINTH (SET)

meta.s: Clay falls to the floor.
Kroenen stands there, unfazed by Clay's bullets in his chest.
Dust pours from his wounds and piles up neatly at his feet.
He hears Hellboy coming.He places the knife on the floor, then lies down and plays dead.
Hellboy appears at the end of the tunnel.
He glances at Kroenen's body, then quickly checks for a pulse on Clay.
Hellboy looks demolished.
SMASH

scene.sceneheader: INT. TAXI CAB (MOVING) / EXT. BPRD ADJACENT AVENUE - DAY

meta.s: An ethnic pop song blasts from the taxi radio.
Liz pokes her head out of the window and shoots a Polaroid snapshot.
She passes it to Myers:

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: It feels good to be outside!!

meta.s: He can't hear her over the music.
Myers knocks on the bulletproof acrylic divider.
He merely changes the radio station; the music stays at the same volume.
Myers looks back at Liz.
She is halfway out the window, sitting on the door.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: That's not -- That's not safe, Miss Sherman -- Miss Sherman?

meta.s: She takes another Polaroid and passes it down to him.
Myers looks at the Polaroid, then smiles.
He climbs out of the other window, hands her the photograph.
He waves at her.
For the first time, she smiles.
She takes his picture.
With the cold morning wind blowing Liz's hair and the sun on her face, she looks beautiful.
Myers taps his fingers on the roof, to the beat of the music.
He can't take his eyes off her.
They drive towards the BPRD.
Unconscious, Abe floats in a special tank.
LED strips read water temperature, pH level, etc.
He's encased in a bio-cast: a cybernetic healing unit wrapped around his thorax and right arm.
A web of tubes and hoses keeps him in place.
SHIRTLESS and bandaged, Hellboy sits and studies him, as if in a trance.
Hellboy turns, Manning is there:

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: But not everyone was so lucky.
Clay probably won't survive the night.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: I knew those men better than you did --

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: That makes it all alright then.

meta.s: He turns to leave.
Hellboy gets up.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: No, it doesn't make it right, but I stopped that creature, didn't I?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: What are you trying to say?

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: In the end, after you've killed and captured every freak out there -- there's still one left: you.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (a deep sigh) I wish I could be more gracious but --

meta.s: BAMMMMM!!!!
He smashes a metal LOCKER with his stone hand and raises it above his head.
