Manning cowers, realizing that Hellboy's rage is a dangerous thing.

scene.sceneheader: INT. B.P.R.D. - MAIN HALL AREA - DAY

meta.s: A new space.
Office corridors radiate out from a brass B.P.R.D.
logo on the floor.
A few agents monitor computer stations and tactical glass boards.
Liz and Myers walk in, carrying her suitcases.
She looks around and sees BROOM coming down the hall.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: It's only for the weekend, Professor Broom.
Then I'll be on my way --

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: (impeccable courtesy) Come and go as you please.
We've made quite a few changes --

meta.s: CRASH!!!
Liz screams and Myers draws his gun.
Smashing through a glass partition, the mangled steel LOCKER lands in the middle of the hall in a rain of glass and aluminum studs.
Next, Manning appears, retreating but unharmed.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: (gasping) I want that thing locked up, starting now -- Now!!!

meta.s: He flees.
Mortified, Broom hurries after Manning.
Hellboy calmly steps through the hole in the wall.
She spins on her heel and walks off.
Hellboy turns to Myers.
Myers holsters his gun and follows Liz.
Hellboy is all alone now.
A familiar cell.
Fireproof insulation covers the walls.
Liz throws her bags on the bed.
Myers lingers in the doorway.
She reflexively pulls on one of the rubber bands on her wrist, then lets it snap.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: A little something I learned in therapy.
I'm depressed -- (snaps a rubber band) One rubber band.

meta.s: He sits by her side on the bed.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: I'll get you a fresh pack.

meta.s: A cat bats at a ball of paper.
On it, two words are visible: DEAR LIZ.
Hellboy's tail scoops up the paper and throws it in a brimming wastebasket.
He's sitting at a stainless steel desk, deep in concentration, writing with evident difficulty.
The floor around him is covered with more crumpled pages.
In the background, the projector is showing DUCK SOUP.
Myers pushes in a cartload of CHILI.
Myers sets the tray on the table.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: What's a good word -- a solid word for "need" --

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Start in, you got nachos coming.

meta.s: As he goes out, Liz appears in the doorway.
Hellboy quickly stops writing.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: (notices the small feline army) Oh, my God... Look at them all!

meta.s: Liz plays with a cat.
Hellboy lifts the piece of paper, which looks like a postage stamp in his stone hand.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Um... Liz -- I -- there's something I'd like you to -- something I need you to hear.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: For a cup of coffee, but go ahead, read.

meta.s: Hellboy stands up, walks towards her.
Myers walks back in pushing a tray of nachos.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: (to Hellboy) Hey, your chili's getting cold --

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: What did you want me to hear -- ?

meta.s: Hellboy folds the paper.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Just a list -- It's not finished --

meta.s: She leaves.
Myers smiles.
Under a sheet, Kroenen's cold, naked body lies on a slab.
Broom talks into a tape recorder.
The visible areas of the body make us grateful for the sheet covering the rest.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Suffered a masochistic compulsion known as surgical addiction.

meta.s: The silver hand and harness lie on a table.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: Both eyelids were surgically removed along with his upper and lower lips, making speech impossible.
The blood in his veins dried up decades ago.
(looks at an X-ray film) Four pulverized vertebrae.
A steel rod inserted into his pelvis held him up.
(beat) What horrible will power could keep a thing like this alive?

meta.s: He finds the small pieces of paper Kroenen planted in his pouch.
Under the gaze of high-security cameras, AGENT LIME rolls Hellboy's food cart down the corridor and into the domed intersection.
He whistles a happy tune.
Opens the high security door.
Lime's jaw drops.
Across the room, one of the walls has been completely demolished, revealing a SERVICE SHAFT.
No sign of Hellboy.
Lime peeks into the SERVICE SHAFT.
OMIT
Myers and Liz leave a coffee shop, strolling down the street.
Myers hands Liz her coffee.
They chat and laugh.
He pushes his Moped.
She has her Polaroid with her.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: What are you two talking about.

meta.s: Liz and Myers pause at a corner, waiting for the light.
The shops are closing.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: My uncle used to say... we like people for their qualities but love them for their defects.

meta.s: Liz half-smiles, sips her coffee.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: (beat) I've missed him too, but now, every time I see him, I get confused.
Hardly a day goes by he's not in my mind.
Even now, I feel he's here --

meta.s: As they walk down the street.
A red streak jumps over roof tops.
Hellboy lands neatly on the adjacent roof.
He looks down at Myers and Liz -- Myers offers her cream and sugar.
She takes the coffee, waves off the half and half.
Trying to feel superior, Hellboy chuckles.
As they walk, Liz gestures vigorously.
His smile fades.
By now, all the shops are closed.
They approach a small park near a train track.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: Newark, New Jersey, entertainment capital of the world.

meta.s: She cleans off a wet, dirty bench, sits down.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: You offered me a cup of coffee.
I've got one, so just sit down.

meta.s: Myers is falling for her.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. BUILDING ROOFTOP - FIRE ESCAPE - NIGHT

meta.s: Hellboy leaps off a building.
Two red hands appear over the rooftop parapet.
Cursing, Hellboy hauls himself up.
He finds himself next to a pigeon coop where a YOUNG KID is feeding the birds.
The kid stares at him.
He watches as Liz and Myers sit on the bench.
Broom examines the damage to the wall.
He turns to see Hellboy's locator belt hanging on the wall.
Broom shakes his head.

dialogue.name: LIME
dialogue.s: Should we send out some scouts?

meta.s: Broom motions for him to stop.
It's useless,

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: He will never change -- always a child.

meta.s: Kroenen's body lies on the table.
Slowly, his chest starts to rise and fall.
He sits up.
His arm stump docks into the prosthetic hand -- Click!
He flexes the shiny fingers.
Kroenen's hideous cranium is visible for an instant before he zips up his mask.
He takes the sharp Ragnarok knives and turns one over.
It reflects a figure standing behind him: Grigory.
The pigeon kid walks towards Hellboy, carrying two glasses of milk and a plate of cookies.
He sits by Hellboy's side as he watches Liz and Myers chatting and laughing.
Hellboy grabs three cookies off the plate and scarfs them down.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Look at him, those shifty eyes, that -- phony grin...!!
(seeing the last cookie) You gonna eat that?

meta.s: Below, Myers yawns.
Hellboy slaps his forehead.
He looks around, picks up a pebble, hefts it.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. NEWARK N.J. STREET - LIZ AND MYERS - NIGHT

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: We all have a side that we try to hide...

meta.s: Myers stretches and places his hand and arm behind her back.
Something hits him in the head.
He gets up, annoyed.
No one in sight.
Hellboy snickers, hiding and chewing a cookie.
The Kid gives him a high five.
Kroenen's two pieces of paper are joined together under a MICRO-SCANNER.
Broom watches as computer enhancement fills out a couple of missing areas.
Cyrillic letters are now legible.
Broom pulls out a few old photos.
Finds one of Grigory in German uniform, and in a book, another of Grigory in an Orthodox priest's black cassock.
He pulls out his old wooden box, pulls out a dusty book from it.
His fingers scan the text, finding Rasputin's date of birth, date of death.
They pause at a particular line: "His mausoleum is at SEBASTIAN PLACKBA #16".
TCHK!!
A noise -- Broom turns in time to see Kroenen delicately descending a spiral staircase, blade in hand.
In spite of all his experience, Broom is shaken.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: But -- where is... the puppet master?

meta.s: In the dark, a voice hisses --
Broom turns.
Grigory steps from the shadows.

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: It was you: The scraps of paper, Liz's sudden relapse and return...

dialogue.name: GRIGORI
dialogue.s: They both distract him and guide him exactly where I need him.

meta.s: He touches Broom's forehead, lightly --

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: So, In return... Would you permit me?

meta.s: FLASH!!
A nightmarish tableau...
The ruins of New York, charred, smoldering.
Human remains litter the landscape.
Monstrous shapes lumber in the distance... an army of apocalyptic beasts outlined against the blood-red sky.
Dominating the horror is a mountain of festering skeletons and skulls.
At the top, a figure: HELLBOY, transformed.
His horns are in full bloom, his eyes and mouth stream unearthly fire.
Startled, Broom snaps out of it --

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: If only you had him destroyed sixty years ago, none of this would come to pass.
But, then, how could you have known?

meta.s: Broom is speechless.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Your God chooses to remain silent.

meta.s: Rasputin stands, the flesh of his neck and shoulders heaving and twitching beneath his human skin.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: In the frozen waters of the Malaya Nevka, in the darkness of the void: every time I died and crossed over, a little more of the Master came back with me.
He disclosed to me the child's true name... Would you like to know it?

dialogue.name: BROOM
dialogue.s: I know what to call him.
Nothing you can say or do will change that.

meta.s: Discreetly, Broom removes his rosary and places it on the book.
Kroenen settles in behind him.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Now, I'll add two crumbs more: (Kroenen displays his knives) Grief and revenge...

meta.s: Kroenen's knife goes in.
The pigeons flutter on the rooftop.
The pigeon kid sits by Hellboy's side.

dialogue.name: KID
dialogue.s: Just go down there and tell her how you feel!
(Hellboy shakes his head: no) My mom says --

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: You're not old enough to give me advice.

meta.s: Hellboy turns and sees -- TWO of the black B.P.R.D.
Sedan cars rounds the corner.
Agent Lime bounds out of one of the vehicles, grabbing Myers, talking rapidly.
Liz screams, covers her ears.
OMIT
Agents and Bureau employees are crammed into Broom's office doorway.
Hellboy, face contorted by grief, pushes through.
The room is full of forensics people taking pictures, picking up evidence, etc.
Tom Manning is there.
Seeing Hellboy, he respectfully steps back.
Broom's fragile body lies slumped in his chair.
At his feet, a pool of blood.
Liz enters, then stifles a whimper.
With tears in his eyes, a disbelieving Hellboy looks at Liz, then at his dead father.
He holds Broom's body close to his chest.
Manning herds everybody out.
From the door, Liz blinks back tears as the red giant kneels by the body: a dog with a lost master.
OMIT
It's raining like hell.
The PALLBEARERS, Manning and Myers among them, load Broom's casket into a HEARSE.
Flanking it are two rows of BPRD agents.
The hearse doors close and the vehicle pulls away.
Watching like a gargoyle from a distant roof: Hellboy.
Rain bounces off his wet overcoat.
Liz observes him, worried.

dialogue.name: LIZ'S VOICE
dialogue.s: He hasn't spoken to anyone in three days.
He doesn't eat, he doesn't sleep...

meta.s: Abe, conscious now, but still in the cast, floats upside down, solving a RUBIK'S CUBE.
Liz stands by the tank.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: I've never seen him like this.

meta.s: She smiles faintly.

dialogue.name: ABE
dialogue.s: Listen -- I'm not much of a problem solver... (displays the cube) Three decades and I've only gotten two sides.
(beat) But I know this much: if there's trouble -- all we have is each other.
(beat) So -- Take care of the big monkey for me, will you?

meta.s: Their hands almost touch, separated only by the glass.
OMITTED
A PROJECTION SCREEN shows the enhanced image of the piece of paper with Cyrillic characters.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: We've collected and destroyed thousands of eggs.
No trace of this "Sammael" or this "Rasputin" character.

meta.s: In a meeting room, Manning stands at a polished obsidian desk.
A group of agents -- Myers among them -- listens attentively.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Volokolamsk fields, fifty miles from Moscow.
We leave as soon as we get clearance and equipment --

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Hellboy's coming -- (beat) But I'll be in charge this time.
Either we wrap this up or I'm closing this freak show for good.

meta.s: Myers spots Liz walking past the conference room.
Hellboy stands before Broom's desk, pensive, his naked chest bandaged.
Liz watches him from across the room.
He finds Broom's rosary on top of the book.
Reads the underlined phrase on the page.
He turns to her.
She slowly comes towards him.
Hellboy nods, then clears his throat.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (beat) But -- I have something to say, too.
(beat) I never had the guts before -

meta.s: He looks her in the eye.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: But I understand what you don't like about me.
What I am makes you feel out of place -- out there --

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: He makes you feel like you belong.
I -- wish I could do something about this -- (points at his own face) But I can't.
(beat) I can promise you only two things... One: I'll always look this good.
Two: I won't give up on you.

meta.s: Super: TOPOCKBA STEEL MILLS, MOSCOW A wasteland of rust and decay.
Rotting warehouses line the street like dead steel watchdogs.
No one's around but a few lonely sentries.
A limo and motorcycle caravan are waved through the security gates.
A metal door trundles back and the limo and escort motorcycles enter.
Fleshy Russian General -- LAPIKOV -- gets out of the limo.
Then Ilsa and Grigory.

dialogue.name: GENERAL LAPIKOV
dialogue.s: I have accumulated many objects of great interest.

meta.s: The warehouse contains a world of bric-a-brac: a towering marble LENIN HEAD, Old Master paintings, tanks, warheads, missiles, etc.

dialogue.name: GENERAL LAPIKOV
dialogue.s: Many -- like me -- believe Mother Russia to be very close to a historic rebirth.

meta.s: They stop before a cargo container.
With a butane torch, a soldier melts away the lead Kremlin seal, then open the doors.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MOSCOW WAREHOUSE - THE CONTAINER - SAME

meta.s: A massive stone monolith of polished MARBLE.

dialogue.name: LAPIKOV
dialogue.s: This thing fell from the sky into Tungaska forest.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: It burned hundreds of square miles of forest.
The Romanovs took possession of it immediately.
The Czar guarded it jealously -- I have wanted it for ages.

meta.s: Grigory's fingers brush over its smooth, perfect surface.
At the center -- -- TWO CIRCULAR IMPRINTS that match Hellboy's four-fingered stone hand.

dialogue.name: GENERAL LAPIKOV
dialogue.s: You are aware, of course, there's no way you'll get it out of Russian territory.

meta.s: Ilsa brings out a chrome box, full of gold.

dialogue.name: GENERAL LAPIKOV
dialogue.s: It's a pleasure doing business with you.

meta.s: Grigory's voice drips with serene brutality.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Enjoy the bright metal you've earned.
There will be no further transactions.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. THE NIGHT SKY (MATTE SHOT) - NIGHT

meta.s: A massive CARGO PLANE slices the white eye of a full moon.
A map details the plane's journey over the Black Sea.
Super: RUSSIAN AIRSPACE - BLACK SEA.
As the plane engines DRONE, Myers supervises BPRD agents Lime and Stone, who stencil a large crate: FRAGILE!
LIVE CARGO.
Hellboy and Liz stand around a brightly-lit work table.
Hellboy shows them the medieval illustration of Sammael.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: So: you pop one, two come out.
You kill two, you get four.
You kill four, you're in trouble.
We have to nail 'em all at once.

meta.s: MANNING shows them a set of GRENADE BELTS.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: We've installed a very handy timer.
Cable pulls the safety pins, K-boom!
Easy to clean, easy to use...

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: Each of us gets a belt.

meta.s: Manning looks at Hellboy, irate.
Hellboy wraps Broom's rosary on his wrist.
OMIT
Two gleaming black vans and a truck move through snow-covered Soviet roads.
Super: VOLOKOLAMSK FIELDS, MOSCOW.

scene.sceneheader: EXT./INT. COUNTRYSIDE - IN THE TRUCK CAB - DAY

meta.s: Myers and LIZ struggle with a Moscow map.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: (into a radio) Sparky to Big Red...

meta.s: Popping her head out of the window, Liz looks back at the truck bed.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. COUNTRYSIDE - THE TRUCK BED - DAY

meta.s: Fastened to it, the crate labelled: LIVE CARGO.
Small breathing holes have been drilled in the sides.

scene.sceneheader: EXT./INT. COUNTRYSIDE - THE TRUCK CAB- DAY

meta.s: Liz snickers.

scene.sceneheader: INT. INSIDE THE CARGO BOX - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy, sitting on the floor, in the dark.

dialogue.name: LIZ'S VOICE
dialogue.s: (on radio) We're leaving the main road, so hang on --

meta.s: They hit a series of bumps.
The box rattles and shakes.
Hellboy bangs his head.
The vehicle lurches to a halt.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (on the radio) This better be the place or I'll puke.

meta.s: Motors are turned off.
The crate is opened.
Liz peeks in.
Hellboy steps out.
Takes a moment to adjust his eyes to the light.

dialogue.name: 19TH CENTURY CEMETERY (MATTE SHOT / COMPOSITE)
dialogue.s: Broken spiked fences succumb to rust and dead vines.
Endless rows of crypts and tombstones poke through wild foliage.

meta.s: Our group plus TWO AGENTS (Lime and Stone) venture into the labyrinthine lanes of the dead.
Each carries a backpack, a flashlight and a gun.
Later.
The group gathers in frustration in an area of baroque funerary monuments.
Myers -- carrying the explosive belts -- looks around.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: And it stinks, and it's muddy.
We'll go back, check into a hotel, regroup after breakfast.
We'll have to make a grid, go by quadrants.

meta.s: He gestures and all the agents head for the vans.
The group surrounds a grave.
Hellboy raises the broken stone cover and then jumps in.
-- and lands on a rotten coffin.
In it, a mummified corpse lies in a miserable black suit.
He presses the amulet on the cadaver's forehead.
For a moment, nothing, and then... ...a brutal spasm!!
The corpse gasps, breathes... and mutters something in tongueless Russian.
SUBTITLE: WHAT DO YOU WANT?
The group gawks as Hellboy climbs out, carrying the CORPSE on his back.
With an ear-to-ear grin, he approaches the team.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Sixty feet further, comrades, and three rows in...

meta.s: The corpse fidgets on Hellboy's back.
Its bony hand weakly points, as if in confirmation.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: This here is Ivan Klimentovich: Say "hi" Ivan.

meta.s: The corpse mutters again.
SUBTITLED: GO THAT WAY, RED MONKEY.
A miniature black marble castle.
Using a crowbar, Myers pries open the ancient steel door.
Hellboy, still carrying the desiccated abomination on his back, walks in.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. YEFIMOVICH MAUSOLEUM STAIRS - LATER - DAY

meta.s: Two agents stand guard in the mausoleum, while the group descends carefully.
The walls are dotted with yellowed skulls.
Myers' flashlight flickers.
He shakes it back to life.
They reach the bottom of the staircase: three corridors branch off in different directions.
Hellboy deposits the CORPSE attop a pile of coffins.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: We'll be alright... as long as we don't separate --

scene.sceneheader: INT. UNDERGROUND CORRIDOR AND INTERSECTION - DAY

meta.s: TCHKANGGG!!!!!
large spiked metal plates shoot up from below, blocking both their way out, demolishing the staircase and ramming Stone: he's gone.
Wicked spikes cover the metal surface.
Hellboy still bangs on it, but to no avail: it's at least six inches thick.
Liz and Myers are on the other side.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (into his walkie-talkie) Okay, someone's expecting us.
Turn on your locators -- Anyone sees anything...

meta.s: On the other side of the panel, Myers takes the radio from Liz.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: (into radio) Are you sure about this?

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: On a scale of one to ten: two.
But -- (beat) -- she'll take care of you, Myers.

meta.s: Liz and Myers move off.
Hellboy shines his light down the tunnel on the left.
Agent Lime picks up the corpse and follows.
Hellboy and Manning come into a vast chamber: Slavic motifs crown the rugged stone pillars and archways.
Water runs down the walls.
Across a small stone bridge, light pours from a hexagonal structure.
They step onto the bridge.
KLANGGG!!!
two gears release a steel door from above, forcing them to forge ahead.
Somewhere, a massive clockwork is TICKING.
Hellboy motions for silence.
The CORPSE mutters: "IT'S

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: We should go back -- you -- you could tear that door apart --

meta.s: Hellboy yanks Manning just in time.
BAMMM!!!!
A gigantic metal pendulum swings past and demolishes one third of the bridge a few feet from their feet.
It takes Lime and the CORPSE with it.
Another door on the far end of the bridge shudders downward.
Whoosh!
The PENDULUM swings back.
It destroys more of the bridge.
Manning sprints for all he's worth and crawls under the door.
Hellboy runs, but chunks of stone disintegrate under his feet.
The pendulum swings back taking out the final piece of the bridge just as Hellboy rolls under the door -- -- and makes it into the hexagonal building.
Hellboy and Manning find themselves in a very narrow, arched stone corridor.
Its walls are lined with endless rows of rusty steel blades.
Faint traces of WAGNER can be heard.
They cautiously proceed...
There.
In yellow gaslight, Kroenen nods attentively as a phonograph plays the love duet from TRISTAN UND ISOLDE.
Above him, ropes, hooks and pulleys.
Manning rest his hand too close to a blade.
Kroenen comes alert.
He scans the room, quietly winds himself up.
Hellboy shoots a dirty look at Manning and then looks back into the chamber -- -- Kroenen is gone.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: This guy moves like a cockroach --

meta.s: Hellboy readies his gun and then creeps toward the lab.
Hellboy's footsteps elicit soft creaks from the wooden floor.
Manning moves along behind him.
The record finishes playing.
Silence -- SWISH!!!
Kroenen's whirling blades slice the air, ripping into Manning's arm.
As Kroenen goes in for the kill -- -- Hellboy thrusts out his stone fist as a shield.
Kroenen bears down but Hellboy fends him off with powerful, deliberate blocks.
Kroenen hauls out one of his long swords.
Hellboy yanks it away and bends it like a twig.
BAMMMM!!!!
He punches Kroenen in the face, crumpling the steel mask, smashing its lenses.
BAMMM!!!!
another hit.
Kroenen staggers back with each blow.
Finally, the mask falls off.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Give your soul to God, Your ass is mine.

meta.s: An asthmatic wheeze erupts from his scarred face.
Kroenen is laughing.

scene.sceneheader: INT. HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: BAM!!!
Under his feet, a huge trapdoor falls open.
He and Manning drop through, along with the phonograph.
Hellboy grabs a rope.
It spins through a copper pulley, but a large knot jerks him to a stop.
Hellboy snatches Manning's hand, but loses his backpack.
He looks down.
The phonograph hits the ground with a crash.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: (panting, whispers) Well, it's not that big a fall...

meta.s: KLANGGGG!!!!!
The entire bottom bristles with six-foot, sparkling steel blades.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Kroenen cautiously leans over the pit.
He can't hear a sound.
As he peeks -- SWISH!!
A loop of the rope wraps around his neck and yanks him forward!
Before he goes over, he frantically digs his blades into the floor, anchoring himself.

scene.sceneheader: INT. HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy has used the rope hanging below him as a lasso.
MANNING clings to his powerful back as he climbs up, hand over hand.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Kroenen goes to cut the rope...

scene.sceneheader: INT. HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: (reaching the top) Oh, no you don't --

meta.s: Hellboy wraps the rope around his stone fist and, with a brutal stone-fist yank, pulls KROENEN into the pit!
With a horrible scream, Kroenen drops headfirst past them and onto the spikes.
He wriggles like a fish caught on a hook, only making it worse, as he slides further down the blades.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy climbs out and sits.
Sees Kroenen's blade embedded in the floor.
Holding it: the prosthetic hand, still ticking.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy peers down.
Still alive, Kroenen frees one arm, slicing through his own ropy bicep.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: You like playing possum, you Nazi pinhead?

scene.sceneheader: INT. BOTTOM OF HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy tips a massive cogwheel over the edge.
Kroenen emits a horrid scream as it crushes him.

scene.sceneheader: INT. ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT - DAY

meta.s: Manning sits down, bandaging his injuries.
Hellboy kneels down.
Manning nods weakly.
Hellboy brings out a cigar and fires up his Zippo.

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: You call that thing a cigar?

dialogue.name: MANNING
dialogue.s: You never, ever light a cigar that way.

meta.s: He digs out one of his fine cigars, cuts it and hands it to HELLBOY.
He lights it for him.
Hellboy grins.
OMIT

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "B" - UNDERGROUND NARROW TUNNEL - DAY

meta.s: A narrow tunnel.
Liz and Myers advance carefully.
Just ahead, a cave-in.
Pieces of ceiling, timber, coffins and corpses form a chaotic barrier.
As they squeeze past...

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: So, he thinks that you and I... That's why he's mad at me --

meta.s: A few bones roll by.
Wet earth drops onto their shoulders.
They draw their arms close to their bodies, pointing their flashlight beams straight down.
A moment of strange intimacy.

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: But it's not true, is it?

dialogue.name: MYERS
dialogue.s: That you feel that way about me.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: Red, white, whatever -- Guys are all the same.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "C" - UNDERGROUND TUNNEL - STEEP SLOPE - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy labors up a steep slope, using rocks and roots for handholds.
He reaches a dead end and collapses, out of breath.
Light filters through a crack in the ground; he can faintly hear Liz and Myers.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "B" - UNDERGROUND TUNNEL - CAVERN AREA - DAY

meta.s: Liz and Myers reach a wider section of Tunnel "B".
They find themselves calf-deep in brown water.
Myers lights Liz's path as she steps onto a large stone.
His light shorts out.
She shines her light past him.
Myers turns.
His flashlight comes back on, revealing a complex natural cavern.
An entire WALL IS COVERED with translucent eggs.
SAMMAEL is there, gnawing on a dry arm bone, with the hand still attached.
When the light hits his face, his milky pupils constrict.
A snarl... A SECOND SAMMAEL emerges from the water.
It shakes itself off.
A THIRD ONE raise its head.
Myers and Liz try to back away, but a metal wall rises right behind them KLANKKKKK!!!
They are trapped!!
Myers goes to grab a set of explosive belts.
Tries to set up the timer.
Zipp!
-- one Sammael snatches them away.
Myers falls to the ground, clothes torn, injured.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: (into the radio) Marco, Marco, Marco... Get your Big Red butt over here!

meta.s: Something stomps on the ceiling directly above them.
Again and again.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "C" - UNDERGROUND TUNNEL FLOOR - DAY

meta.s: Hellboy pounds the floor with his rock hand.
Furiously.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Hang on kid, I'm coming for you!

meta.s: The rocks below him start to crumble.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ANTHILL VIEW OF UNDERGROUND TUNNELS AND PITS - DAY

meta.s: In an "ANT FARM" view of the complex, we see Hellboy above, pummeling and -- in the cavern below -- Liz and Myers.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "B" - UNDERGROUND TUNNEL CAVERN AREA - DAY

meta.s: Dust and rocks fall from above.
The four identical creatures move in on Liz and Myers.
Myers shoots one in the head three times.
The creature shakes off the hits as if pelted with pebbles.
One of them springs.
As it flies through the air, Hellboy crashes through the ceiling.
He lands on top of it along with a ton or two of stone.
The creature is crushed.
Two eggs glow, metamorphosing.
Presto -- two new Sammaels are born.
The first two Sammaels growl, joined by the two new ones.
Liz sprints to safety.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Just couldn't leave you two alone.

meta.s: Hellboy scoops up Myers and deposits him next to Liz.
Lit by Myers' flashlight, two of the creatures jump.
One clamps onto Hellboy's back, the other onto his leg.
Hellboy howls.
The third one joins in, like lions dragging down a zebra.
This time, though, the zebra fights back.
Hellboy pulls out his gun and fires a round into the chest of a Sammael.
Two eggs glow -- two new Sammaels are born.
They're FIVE.
Hellboy's torso is covered in blood.
He falls to the ground.
A fourth and a fifth creature spring onto him, biting.
Hellboy is in trouble.
Liz watches and shivers.
A ripple of heat shimmers over her body.
Liz is desperate, crying.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: Hit me -- (beat) All of my life I've run away from it... Now I want it to happen!

meta.s: Hellboy screams.
Water explodes under the fighting bodies.
Two of the Sammaels turn their attention to Liz and Myers.
Liz slaps him.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: I know now: I love him.

meta.s: A beat of silence, then Myers slaps her across the face, once.
Hard.
The heat ripple builds.
The air vibrates around her.
Her pupils kick back light, like an animal's.
Myers ducks behind a rock as Liz's arms blaze with fire.
The two approaching Sammaels are ready to pounce.
On top of Hellboy, one of them turns its head, like a lion hearing the hunter's gunshots.
A staggering Hellboy sees Liz's body shake in a surge of white-hot energy.
The water at her feet blows away as a concave shockwave of fire expands.
The fire engulfs the creatures.
Devours them all.

scene.sceneheader: INT. TUNNEL "B" - UNDERGROUND TUNNEL CAVERN AREA - DAY

meta.s: The screen FADES TO WHITE and then...
Silence, then a pulse.
A high ringing tone.
A heartbeat.
Hellboy pushes away the half-cooked remains of two Sammaels.
The other creatures are little more than blackened bones.
He stumbles forward.
No water left.
Everything is half-buried in a cracked, bone-dry bed of mud.
Liz lies on the ground, on her side, unconscious.
Myers is alive, but too groggy to even acknowledge it.
Weakly, Hellboy turns around: In the eerie silence of his deafness, he sees Grigory -- LAUGHING noiselessly, witness to an absurd comedy.
Ilsa approaches.
And -- in a simple, brutal move -- hits him with a hammer -- /
OMIT
Hellboy slowly comes to.
He is chained to a massive wooden yoke.
He takes notice of his surroundings: a large church- like space, surrounded by funeral niches and statues holding swords.
High columns flank huge mechanical gears.
An SOLAR SYSTEM MODEL takes the place of an altar.
Off to one side, Ilsa uses a hammer to destroy the timers on the explosive belts.
Next to the main nave, Myers is tied to a stone pillar.
Under his feet, a blood channel, leading to the immense stone slab bought from Lapikov.
Liz lies at Grigory's feet.
He's dressed in a ceremonial robe and holds his leather book open.
His back to Hellboy, he faces a mural of the angel Abbadon holding a key.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: "And I looked and beheld an Angel, and in his hand the key to the bottomless pit..."

meta.s: Hellboy tenses, rage building.
The yoke creaks, but doesn't bend.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: (gestures at the stone piece) These were the words I heard as a peasant boy in Tobolsk.
And now, the door -- Sent by the Ogdruh Jahad so that they might at long last enter our world.

meta.s: Hellboy studies the stone sculpture, its three HAND IMPRINTS --

dialogue.name: ILSA
dialogue.s: (triumphant) What did you think it was made for?

meta.s: Hellboy stares at his huge right arm, as if for the first time.
Ilsa kicks Myers in the face.
The open dome above reveals the moon.
An eclipse is beginning.
The altar's clockworks monitors its progress.

dialogue.name: ILSA
dialogue.s: Imagine it: An eden for you and her --

meta.s: Grigory turns to Hellboy.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: (reasonable) In exchange for her life then, open the door.

meta.s: In torment, Hellboy, shakes his head: no.
He leans over Liz, whispers in her ear: Her body arches, her mouth emits a plume of energy.
Grigory greedily inhales it.
Then she goes limp.
He struggles again.
One of the cuffs snaps.
He swats Ilsa with his free hand.
She stumbles backwards.
Now Hellboy fights to free his other hand.
Indifferent, Grigory watches the eclipse.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Her soul awaits on the other side.
If you want her back... (beat) Open the door and claim her.

meta.s: His head and heart racing, Hellboy struggles for an answer.
Can't find one... the moon is almost totally eclipsed.
He drops his gaze.
His voice a hoarse whisper.
Grigory moves close to Hellboy.
Rips the rosary off his wrist.
It lands near Myers.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Names hold the power and nature of things.

meta.s: Hellboy's stone arm glows.
Ancient symbols of fire burn the stone.
Flames momentarily engulf his body.
Hellboy roars as his HORNS majestically burst forth!
Out of his mouth, energy and light boil like condensing breath on a winter's night.
Inebriated with power, the new PRINCE OF HELL smiles with supreme arrogance.
His shadow falls on the white marble of the slab and mysteriously spreads over it until the stone turns black as obsidian.
HELLBOY inserts his enormous paw into the FIRST IMPRINT on the stone slab -- CLACK!!
He turns it, like a lock.
A beam of crimson light shoot upwards into the sky.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. VIEW FROM THE CITY - NIGHT

meta.s: Visible from all over Moscow, the beam blazes to the moon!
The same phenomenon as in the prologue, but this time it's more intense, with ripples and haloes.
Again, the infinite, starry space.
Again, the OGDRU JAHAD.
The ruby beam pierces the darkness.
Hellboy watches as the FIRST IMPRINT disappears.
In its place: a burning glyph.
Myers struggles with his bindings.
The rough hemp cuts his skin, but he manages to free one hand.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. ON THE OTHER SIDE - NIGHT

meta.s: OGDRU JAHAD shifts, suddenly breaking free.
Gelatinous limbs uncurl, expand.
Its enormity puzzles the eye, obscuring the frame.
Hellboy thrusts his hand into the SECOND IMPRINT.
CLACK!
He turns it.
Myers spots the broken rosary and reaches for it --

dialogue.name: IN THE STORM CLOUDS, LIGHTNING ILLUMINATES GARGANTUAN
dialogue.s: TENTACLES REACHING INTO THE EARTHLY PLANE.

meta.s: Grigory drinks in the first signs of the arrival and laughs.
Hellboy puts his hand inside, CLACK!!!
Before he can turn it, Myers reaches the rosary.
Ilsa lunges at him.
He clobbers her full in the face.
She staggers back and down.
He throws the rosary at Hellboy.
Instinctively, Hellboy catches it.
It smokes in his hand.
He tosses it away.
It lands next to the explosive belts.
Hellboy opens his palm, seeing the smoking, charred imprint of the cross and beads.
He looks over at Grigory.
With a blood-curdling scream, Hellboy grabs his horns with both hands, brutally snaps them off.
Energy spews from the stumps.
He stabs Grigory with one of them.
Grigory drops to his knees, holding his stomach.
Hellboy drops the blood-stained horn.
The final lock disappears into the stone.
The light flickers and the connection with the moon is broken.
Ilsa, licking her bloody lips, looks up.
The sky is silent.
The thunderclouds are parting.
The eclipse has ended.
Grigory crumples in agony.
The burning glyphs in Hellboy's stone hand dim down, his features and body resume their usual shape.
All is quiet.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: You will never fulfill your destiny.
You will never understand the power inside you.

meta.s: He breaks Myers' chains, helps him up.
Hellboy painfully takes Liz's limp body in his arms.
Myers stands by his side.
He kisses her forehead, caresses her hair, then walks down the steps.
Myers steps on something.
He looks under his foot: A smashed GLASS EYE.
Then... out of the silence, a WHISPER.
Hellboy turns.
Grigory, on his knees, smiles.
He looks up.
In his empty eye socket, fleshy tendrils shift lazily.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: You've killed me -- an insignificant man... but you have brought forth a God.

meta.s: He uncovers his abdomen.
Long, fleshy pseudopods spill out of the wound, like intestines.
A large entity erupts from Grigory's torso and claws the air.

dialogue.name: GRIGORY
dialogue.s: Guardian of thresholds, destroyer of worlds.

meta.s: Covered in steamy slime, a seven foot, multi-tentacled shape -- BABY BEHEMOTH -- lands on the stone slab.
The squirming flesh surges up like greasy pink foam.
Growing exponentially by the second.
Ilsa kneels and embraces Grigory's corpse.
Kisses him on the mouth.
A gargantuan tentacled shadow looms above them.

dialogue.name: ILSA
dialogue.s: Hell will hold no surprises for us.

meta.s: A tower of flesh disdainfully crushes them both.
In a passageway, Hellboy carefully hands Liz's body over to Myers.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: I'll deal with whatever's back there.

meta.s: As if in response, a massive tentacle fills the tunnel, reaching for him.
Oil lamps hanging from the ceiling smash onto HELLBOYÂ´S head as he is pulled back at breakneck speed, finally confronting --
BEHEMOTH!!!
The size of a house -- Hellboy -- head smoking -- writhes in the grip of the tentacle.
It suddenly throws him toward the ceiling.
As he arcs back down, ABM!!
-- he cracks the floor wide open.
Next to him: the rosary and the EXPLOSIVE BELTS.
He tries to grab them.
The tentacle slams down, blocking his way.
The vibration sends the belts down into the crack.
They bounce off a small ledge and land further down.
Far below, grinding cogwheels and gears.
Hellboy manages to pull a steel sword from the closest marble statue.
Hellboy stands up and swings the sword for all he's worth.
FWAP!
He cuts clean through the tentacle.
The tip hits the floor, rolling into the crack.
From out of Behemoth's stump... a mass of wriggling tentacles replaces the cut-off section!
They squirm around Hellboy's face as he slashes, again and again, fighting his way forward.
He leans into the crack, stretches his arm, struggling to grab the belts.
A few inches short.
He jumps into the crevice, onto the first ledge.
It crumbles!!
The gears below grind a few falling bricks.
The belts slide away.
A tentacle captures Hellboy, pulls him up.
At the last second, he grabs the belts with his tail.
The beast raises Hellboy high.
A multi-layered mouth opens in the body of BEHEMOTH.
The most horrible proboscis ever seen.
Hellboy's tail passes him the belts.
The timers on them are crushed.
A spark spurts: Useless.
He wraps them around his stone arm.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: Ugh -- Now, this is gonna hurt --

meta.s: He pulls the pin on all the explosives.
BEHEMOTH drops him into a squid-like beak and gulps him down.
After a moment, a weird gurgle emanates from the creature's innards.
Then --
A surge of light roils within the thing, outlining the pulpy organs.
The creature starts to burn.
OMIT
A chain reaction yields a cacophony of explosions as Behemoth is enveloped in a cloud of fire, goo and soft flesh.
Hellboy lands with a sickening, bone-crunching THUD!!!
With a bellow, Behemoth goes down, the limp tentacles missing Hellboy as they vanish in a blaze of energy and light.
Finally, just a few cinders of flesh float in the air.
Hellboy stands, covered in goo.
Two final shockwaves of light ripple over the ground.
Hellboy lurches into the passageway and spots Myers.
Painfully drags himself over.
Liz's body is on the floor.
Manning limps in from an adjacent room.
Hellboy cradles Liz's head in his huge hand.
Holds her against his powerful chest and whispers in her ear.
A beat or two, then a moan.

dialogue.name: LIZ
dialogue.s: In the dark -- I heard your voice -- What -- did you say -- ?

meta.s: He looks at her, lovingly caressing her hair.

dialogue.name: HELLBOY
dialogue.s: "You, on the other side: let her go.
Because for her, for her -- I'll die.

meta.s: Myers smiles.
Liz looks at Hellboy for the first time as what he is: the man she loves.
A warm, gentle fire rims her body.
Manning watches.
Agent Myers smiles a sad smile, illuminated by the flames.
Hellboy and Liz kiss.
The fire haloes them and builds as Tom Waits' CINNY'S WALTZ fills the air.
THE END
